reviewText:
I really like these earrings! They are nice for the price. I have 3 piercings on the lobe of each of my ears and I wear the first 3 smaller sizes on each ear. I think I normally would have given 4 stars, but the price is really amazing for what you get. Here are my thoughts:

Pros:
+ 6 very different sizes are versatile - it's nice to have so many options.
+ Very comfortable for everyday wear, especially for leaving in while sleeping (my main reason for choosing these)
+ Very stylish! I like how bold they look. Maybe people will think I'm cool now!
+ Good quality - I've been sleeping, showering, running, skating, and working out with these in for the past couple weeks and they have not loosened nor fallen out.

Cons:
+ Not the GREATEST quality, but like I said the price is unbeatable. They have the screw threading on the outside, meaning the threading goes through and touches the piercing hole, which is technically not as sanitary as something you'd usually get for professional piercing jewelry. If you're taking these off and on a lot, frequently pushing the threading through your ear isn't recommended. I plan to leave these in for long periods of time, so these work well for me.
+ I saw another reviewer mention this as well - the posts are a tad thick, so they were a bit tight to get in the first time. I worked them in slowly and was patient.

Hey, you can just buy a small set for the same price or get all 12pcs which is 6 pairs. I went  ahead and got the 12 pcs. I do t wear  all of it but I do wear the last three for the price you get the most bang for your buck.

AMAZING DRESS! This dress is beautiful! I tried the same one on in champagne in a bridal boutique that was priced over $2,000. I loved the dress but had been browsing through amazon as well and knew that it would be worth a try to save some money. Man am I glad I did!

 I had it express shipped and it came in about 2-3 weeks. It was inside out, wrapped in a bag that was tapped and in the DHL bag. It felt like Christmas unwrapping it :) I also had ordered a dress from a different seller on amazon that was custom made to my measurements that was in tulle. It was pretty but you could see how that customization wasn't as nice as this seller. I would have had to add a petticoat for that dress too... This one had everything that was already sown in and ready to go, even a elastic bra strap in the back inside of the dress for a bit of support and to hold the dress to your body. I ordered the ivory and it's just beautiful. It is a lighter ivory then what I had tried on in the stores but I am glad it wasn't as dark.. the dress looks white but not bright stark white on light skin.

My mother, sisters and aunts were blown away with this dress, and shocked when I told them where I got it and how much I paid. I will post pictures after my wedding... my fiance is trying to catch a peek before the wedding and I will not let him :) I showed him pictures of about 20 dresses and this is the one he said "omg that's it, it's perfect" to. I can't wait to show him the real one!

My measurements are super hard to find anything that will fit. I have a 10 inch difference in my bust and waist so anything I bought was going to have to be customized or altered, by far this dress was more then I was barging for.

I highly suggest this dress and the dress maker!
dress is beautiful!

reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by this watch.  I thought it would be heavy and cheap looking but it's quite the opposite.  It came nicely packaged with protective film over the face and clasp to protect it from scratching and the battery works so all you have to do is size it, adjust the time and you're all set.  I didn't adjust the size but it appears to adjust by just taking out the links like you would any other watch.  The color is nice and the size is perfect.  Great watch for the money.  I received this watch at a discount in exchange for my honest review and treat my review like I paid full price for it!
summary: Wood watch that's perfect for allergies and someone looking for something different.

reviewText:
This is a gorgeous dark colored sandelwood watch that is lightweight and incredibly unique. It is hypoallergenic so can be worn by anyone allergic to metals, etc. The watch is not adjustable out of the box, but links can be removed to just the right fit for you. Because of it being a natural wood the watch you will get may look slightly different than the one you see on the product page. Each watch will look uniquely beautiful.

WHAT I LOVE ABOUT THIS WATCH
1: Lightweight
2: Hypoallergenic
3: Unique
4: Affordable

WHAT COULD BE IMPROVED
1: No instructions included
2: Box was taped shut with packing tape, making it inappropriate for gift giving

Overall it is a nice watch that is perfect for someone who is allergic to typical watches.  It is unique looking and large enough for even a larger-sized man.  I am thrilled that I received a complimentary sample of this watch in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I reserve 4 and 5 star ratings for products I would either recommend to others or buy myself. I took off one star for the reasons mentioned above.

This is a very fun and unique watch. It's very lightweight and made from wood. It seems to keep time pretty well, but has no Smart watch capabilities. I think for someone who enjoys timepieces this would be a nice gift. I do see how it could get damaged pretty easily due to it being all wood. So, it's one that you would wear out someplace nice and not to rough house or work in. I have a family member who loves stuff made from wood and I think he's going to love this.

"This product was received at a free or discounted price in exchange for my review. I am a technology journalist and pride myself on providing fair and honest reviews. Please feel free to ask any questions you might have."
summary: WOOD All wood it's definitely wood

reviewText: Thin shirt but nice

I am a size 12/14 in dresses so I though to get the XL just to make sure but it was a bit too large. I do not have giant breasts so that is where there was a bit of sagging. There is a zipper on the side but there is also a good amount of elastic on the upper back area that give some wiggle room for different sized chests. I do think that I should have gone with a large. Beyond that this dress was a hit. Super cute, comfortable and well made. I would order it again.

Grace Karin vintage halter swing dress will take you back into the 1950s. With its tight cinched waist, billowing skirt this is definitely a dress to dance the night away in.

I order the floral-4, not quite sure why its called floral 4 as it hasn't any flowers, just lovely little polka dots. The picture that is provided is true what my dress looks like. I know it states that the real color of the item may be slightly different, however mine is a perfect match.

Its long wide halter straps make for more comfortable neck support. The satin straps along the waist help to bring it in to give you a nice tight waist line.

The back has a portion of elastic, which is fantastic. With the elastic backing it allows me to move around freely without ever feeling restricted. Another thing that I like is that its zipper is located on the side of the dress instead of the back, so its less noticeable.

The bottom of the dress is lined inside with satin. This helps to stop any clinging as well as gives a nice full look to the bottom. Soft tulle is sewn around the bottom, because of this I wouldnt machine wash this dress as tulle tends to rip easily.

I think this would make a great dress for Halloween or a fun night out on the town. I received this item for free for my honest unbiased review.
summary: Red and Black Polka Dot Dress

reviewText: The mask part doesn't slip, you can adjust the hood according to the weather you're in, I was in the Rocky Mountains so some days were really windy and it was nice being able to tighten the hood down. I had an excellent opportunity to test this product out. On a recent 12 mile ride the conditions were; 3-5 degrees F, 15 mph with 25 mph gusts, feels like -18 degrees, and unfortunately most of the ride was directly toward the wind. Fortunately this balaclava worked very well! No issues w/ cold or wind. The fit was about 98% satisfactory. Once you have the balaclava on (without the bottom pulled over your mouth and/or nose) the material creates a nice seal around your face. ***I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.***

reviewText: It's getting 4 stars because in the picture the red looks darker, but it's a bright red. It fits perfectly and I love how it's longer and it's soft. It's a little thinner than I thought I was going to be.

After looking around in stores for something like this to wear to work, I turned to this. I had seen others like it by other sellers, but this seller had more positive experiences. And boy, am I glad I went with this!

To start off with, I'm about 5'8", and 210lbs. Normally I go with an Xtra Large since I like my shirts fitted, but my hoodies kinda baggy, but after reading the reviews, I went up a size. My advice, if you're busty, go up an extra size. It'll be a bit snug if you don't.

I needed something lightweight and long (I prefer my hoodies to cover my...assets), so it would replace my sweaters I would normally wear with my khaki leggings for work. This hoodie does the job PERFECTLY. It fits very well for me. The sleeves are nice and long, and the stitching is very well done.

The hood covers my head very nicely, even though I won't be using it. I'll be able to just slap on a T-shirt underneath and head to work.

All in all, it's a great product for the price. I'm definitely happy, and I'll be buying another one in black for not-work wear!

reviewText: I love the longer hoodies with a front pocket and was excited to find this online.  I ordered the pink one (pictured as a bright pastel), but what I received was more of a mauve or dusty pink--much darker than what I'd expected and not in my color wheel.  The fit was a bit disappointing, too, as it ran at least one full size too small.  Be aware that this hoodie is not made of typical sweatshirt material.  It's a thinner fabric (but not sheer); more like a high quality, reinforced t-shirt material.  It is not bulky and does retain body heat well for a fabric that isn't fleece. I can trim the loose threads, but it does make me question the quality of the shirt.

This is a wonderful set of purses, seriously. I am not that picky when i comes to hand bags. I do like the look and design of designer bags, but if i can find a great purse for half the price, i am going to get that instead. I am not brand loyal. I've had these for about 3 weeks now, and i am very impressed. I wanted to make sure i gave ample time in reviewing this set of purses to make sure they stand up to everyday use.

This set, you receive 2 different handbags, 1 chain bag, 1 wallet, and 2 small bags that can be used for make up or keeping important things in. I love how you can have a purse for each occasion. The material of the bags is a bit delicate, but that doesn't really bother me. I really love the wallet. I am always looking for a good wallet. I have many pro beauty industry cards, and a regular wallet can fill up fast. I love how both sides of the wallet have plenty of card slots and and a sipper to keep change in. I also love the medium size hand bag. It is perfect for everyday use, has plenty of room, and since it is black, it can go with any outfit and it will totally look cute. The chain purse is small, but it is great for a nice night out like going on a date, or to a fancy dinner. It looks great with a multitude of dresses and and the chain gives it a little extra sassiness to it.

Overall i am very impressed with the set. I love how there is a purse for any occasion. I highly recommend this set to anyone. If you love purses and are not picky, this set it for you. You will not be disappointed. I received this for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: This is a wonderful set of purses

reviewText:
I bought this dress for my wife during a promotion to get 50% discount in exchange for a review. She is 5'2" and weights around 100lb. She wears XS (0/2) or S (4/6) depending on whether the dress runs large or small. Since this dress does not have size 0/2, I went for a 4/6.

The dress is beautiful! If you are afraid that the material will look or feel cheap, do not worry; it is comfortable and acceptable quality. The finishing of the details is not perfect, but this is expected at this price point.

The only thing we did not like so much is that the dress does not fully adapts to her figure well in the back. I wish they would have a 0/2 to compare and see if this slight misshape is because of being too large or because of the dress design in itself. I think if you are a slightly taller/heavier than my wife, the 4/6 will fit you perfectly

Overall, a great gift and a new pretty dress for my wife's summer collection!

reviewText:
I recently ordered this laptop backpack because I always seem to bring along my laptop whenever I travel, and dragging along two multiple bags can sometimes be an inconvenience.

The bag itself is made up of a tough nylon material, that is both light and durable. While it does not advertise as being water resistant, the material that it is made out of does a pretty good job of keeping whatever is inside dry. Now do not get me wrong, this will not protect your stuff if you are hanging outside in a big downpour, but it will keep your stuff dry during your walk from your car to your nearby destination. Continuing with the exterior, both the shoulder straps as well as the back of the backpack contain some kind of cushioning for an overall more comfortable experience.

This backpack has a total of three zippered pockets, two of which are located on the outside of the bag. The third one is a small pocket that is located on the inside of the largest pocket. You can only store smaller things in it like a handful of pencils or markers, or maybe a phone or a pair of sunglasses. Also inside the largest pocket is a padded compartment to house your laptop inside of. My only gripe with this backpack is that the padding is not tall enough and thus leaves a little bit too much of the laptop exposed for my liking. Inside the smaller external pocket is two pen/pencil slots, as well as a calculator pocket.

All in all I have been quite pleased with the quality of this backpack. It is stylish, it is comfortable, it is durable, and it even has two easily accessible external mesh pockets to hold your drink and your snack.

Note: I purchased this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review, and this IS my honest and unbiased thoughts on this product.

reviewText:
Just received the US Medium and if it fit well I think this would be a great coat, stylish looking, good cut and seems well put together - probably would give it 4-5 stars. Still pretty puzzled about the sizing though. I looked at the chart and I still can't seem to wrap my head around the measurements that they provide. I'm about 5'7" and weigh about 150 lbs with an athletic build. I normally purchase US small coats (North Face, Kuhl, Eddie Bauer, etc). Based on other's reviews, the sizing chart and my other coats I figured the US Medium would be the right size. Unfortunately the shoulders are too snug, chest too tight when the coat is zipped, and even the sleeves are too short. Very puzzling. The label on the coat says XL but when I ordered on Amazon the drop down menu said US Medium/Asia XL. I've ordered the US Large/Asia 4XL (since there seems to be no US Medium+ any longer) and will update my review when I receive the larger size.

*** UPDATE - so after posting this review I looked at my order from Amazon and confirmed that I ordered the US Medium/Asia XL however on the review page it says US XS/Asia XL. I am really puzzled right now and can't tell if they sent me the wrong size (US XS instead of US Medium)! I hope they can get the kinks out of the ordering and sizing. I may have to cancel the US Large I ordered since I really have no idea what they sent!!!

*** UPDATE 2 - after communicating with the seller (who responded very quickly) I received a refund and proper size information. The sizing on the Amazon order drop down menu is accurate now and for my size the US S/Asia 2XL is correct. Unfortunately they did not have the black available on Amazon Prime so I ordered a green and have been very happy with the purchase and sizing. The shoulders are only very slightly tight, although I do have broad shoulders, but not really noticeable. Well worth the <$40 for a coat that could sell for over twice that from an American branded company.
summary: Initial order was incorrect, refunded and much happier now.

*Non-verified Purchase because I bought it with someone else's Prime :P *

I have ONE type of purse I like: Small, leather, black, crossbody, and not hundreds of dollars to buy. I've noticed that's very hard to find. I bought one with those stats at Wilson's Leather 5 years ago and it lasted for a couple years before the suuuuuuper thin leather started peeling apart, and the super thin lining on the inside started tearing. Took me 3 years to find an acceptable replacement at Kohl's. That one lasted 2 MONTHS before it started falling apart at a very rapid rate.

I scoured Amazon for HOURS looking for an affordable, small, durable, black, leather, crossbody purse. Due to the price of this purse, I was suspicious. Everything else like it seemed to be $150+! After much contemplation, I decided to give it a try.

OH MY GOSH ITS EVERYTHING I WANTED AND MORE!!! It's small. The leather seems thick, so it feels like it should last for a loooooong time. If my super flimsy Wilson's Leather one lasted 5 years, this one should last 30. My #1 pet peeve in purses is the inner lining that always tears apart so easily. This purse has a super thick, mega durable cloth lining. I swear this lining will NEVER tear or fall apart! Then we get to the pockets. THERES SO MANY POCKETS! I love it! Everything I carry with me has it's perfect little space. I wondered what in the world I would do with the two tiny pockets in the front. What could they be good for?! Chapstick, tweezers, nail clippers, earbuds, coupons!

Only thing I even REMOTELY sort-of kind-of don't like too much is the stiff bottom with the metal pokers to stand the purse up. But then again, it's actually really nice to set my purse down and not have it flop over. First time I've ever had a purse that stands up haha.

I dearly love this purse, and it feels SO durable that I'm 99.999% I'll never have to replace it. Seriously.
summary: Took me 3+ years to find the perfect purse. Finally found it <3

reviewText:
I got this dress for my girl's performance. The dress is very beautiful and good quality.
My girl, 8.5 yrs with 53in height and 70lbs weight, with wide back were not able to fit in size 8. The color she likes all ran out of size 10. That is the only reason I am going to return the dress.
The Aqua color is like mint green color in the picture, so don't be mislead by the color name if you expect blueish instead of greenish.

At the same time, I ordered another similar looking dress from another seller because it has size 10.
I receive both and I can tell the other dress is definitely a copy version.

(pictures added: on left side is the aqua dress I got from this store, right side is skyblue from another seller.)
1. the material is nice as comfy as this one- organza and lined
2. the skirt is not as full as this one,
3. the raffles are not as pretty
4. the shining stones on this one is hand sewing jewels, the other one is stick on
5. the bow knot on this one is bigger and prettier
6. the elastic back line and stripe makes this one more fits on my girl's body.
7. the zipper is hidden style which I like better on the copy version
8. the flower on this one is pin and the other one is button on which the flower will drop and I have to sew it.

I think this dress is doing clearance. I cannot believe that today's price is as low as $19.99 for this dress. I got it more than double price, and I would keep it if it is not too small for my girl. I wish they still have size 10 and above.
summary: return but giving 5 starts for this dress

reviewText: I struggled with the size chart when ordering because my daughter, who is 9, has measurements of a 24 chest and a 24 waist. I wasn't sure whether to go with a 6 or an 8 for her and ultimately went for the 8 which was perfect up top but a bit too long. My daughter is a little short though, so it was to be expected. With that said, this dress is beautiful and well made. It came in folded up inside a very small plastic bag so of course it has severe wrinkles when I unpacked it. I tried ironing/steaming myself but the wrinkles were very persistent so I ended up taking it to a dry cleaner so they could professionally remove the wrinkles. The dress was pretty flat out of the box but after it came back from the dry cleaners it was beautifully full! I have before and after pictures. We are very happy with this purchase!!

I finally opted to write a review and was prompted to answer product specific questions.  However, the questions referred to fit, comfort, and support and do not address my main complain about this product.  I purchased this product from a shoe store around me about six months ago but have never been able to comfortably wear the inserts for more than the time it takes me to walk about a hundred feet.  No matter how tight I tie my laces, the inserts slip to the middle of my shoes.  I constantly need to take off my shoes to push them to the correct position!  I can't see how anyone can wear these all day without issues.  It's probably possible for the inserts to provide relief, but to do that they need to stay in place.

Gives nice heal cushion, but not really much for arch support. I have normal arches and this doesn't have enough arch support to help my plantar fasciitis at all. I, like other reviewers, can't stand that this is a 3/4 length insole. Are you supposed to take the original insole out, leave it in??? Who knows? It's uncomfortable ether way as you can feel it in there and it will move around throughout the day. I really wish they would have made this full length. It would have made a great 'normal' insole. Doesn't do much for the plantar issue, but it is a cushy heal protection.
summary: Gives nice heal cushion, but not really much for arch support.

reviewText:
I've always enjoyed the comfort of Merrell footwear for hiking and walking, but have not previously been a huge fan of their styling. Fortunately they have addressed this issue and I can say I've had many compliments on the style of this shoe. The comfort is still top notch making this model a great all-day walking shoe. There could be a bit more arch support, but these have more than most comparable fashionable sneakers, which usually tend to sacrifice comfort for style. I walk to work every day in New York and these are now my go-to pair of shoes for fair weather. The suede is obviously not ideal for rain or snow, but the few times I have been caught in the rain in these my feet did not get wet, although the shoes did absorb quite a bit of water. Despite what a few other reviewers have said, my feet never overheat in these, even during the hot and humid NYC summers. They are definitely warm, but not uncomfortably so. I expect these will continue to be very cozy when the cooler autumn weather hits.

So far the build quality seems high, with stitching around the entire sole which should increase the lifespan of the shoe and prevent the sole separating from the shoe. The sole is thick and I expect will last quite a while. The white rubber picks up dirt and is nearly impossible to keep in pristine condition, but I personally think that this adds character to the look of the shoes.

Overall I am happy with my purchase and will continue to buy Merrell in the future.
summary: Updated styling with same comfort you expect from Merrell

Finally found a pair of overalls that weren't "super skinny." These are super comfy and have a nice loose fit without being super baggy. I love the cargo pockets; it's something I've never seen on a pair of overalls before, but they come in handy. Just happy that I finally found a pair that I can lounge around in, throw on when I need to run a quick errand or two, or wear for just about anything when I feel like being comfy and casual. Depending on what's worn with them, they really can be worn for just about anything you want. in my opinion they look super cute with a nice t-shirt (I like the scoop necks, but everyone has their own style), short or long sleeve. I can't vouch for how long they will hold up, as I've only had them for around a month or so - at the time of this review - but they seem pretty well put together and feel like they'll hold up for a long while, depending on what you use them for. I don't think they're made to be a "work" overall, but as far as things go I feel like they will be a part of my wardrobe for several years. I've always loved the interchangeability of a decent looking pair of overalls. I will update my comment if I notice anything that needs to be mentioned later on, but for now I'm happy with my purchase. :-)

reviewText:
This hat--like other hats I've gotten from Supergirl--is nice quality. I like the colors pictured a lot. It isn't super heavy-weight (a big positive!), but the hat is still substantial enough that I think it would work for most people as a winter/outdoor hat. Even though it is made of wool, it isn't suffocatingly heavy. The hat was not too small or tight at all, which I really liked. If you have an average (even verging on large) head, this should work just fine.

The company sent me the beige for review. I think I would love this hat if I'd gotten it in just about any other color, to be honest. I'm light-complected so this color just isn't striking enough for me. That's about me, and not about the hat, though. There is a seam down the front middle, but again, I think that might not show as much in a different color.

Supergirl is one of my favorite hat companies. I own two or three of their hats and ordered another two because I was so happy with them. Their service is great and they are really quick to respond to any questions.
summary: Supergirl is a Favorite of Mine

reviewText:
Pros:
1. The basic idea is good.
2. The soft, very stretchy fabric is extremely comfortable.

Cons:
1. No belt loops.  This significantly limits the versatility, as you need to wear your shirt out to cover the waistband.  For $40 the manufacturer could have included belt loops, and I can't see that there would be any downside to doing so.
2. The fabric is thick and warm.  They'd be more accurately called Track Suit Jeans rather than Pajama Jeans.  In my climate they're nice for the colder half of the year, but hot for summer.
3. The fabric has a silvery sheen at a shallow angle, maybe due to the spandex.  Because of the sheen it doesn't really look like denim.
4. There are strange, faint, horizontal stripes in the front below the pockets.  What's up with that?  The manufacturer must have done it deliberately, but whatever their intent was, I don't like it.
5. The waist drawstring (bias tape) has absolutely no stretch, so the pants can't be pulled off and on quickly.  I replaced the drawstring with 1/2" elastic, and that works better for me.
6. No choice of inseam length.  I'm just lucky that 32" is my size.

Lack of a functional fly could be considered a pro or con.  It is inconvenient, but no worse than track suit pants.  And a zipper fly would compromise  the soft, stretchy comfort.

Despite the longer list of cons than pros, I'm giving it 4 stars because of the comfort.  Most of the cons could be fixed if the company would pay attention to customer feedback.
summary: Very comfortable, but could easily be improved

reviewText:
My husband loves these jeans and I love seeing him wear something more than sweats!  Depending on your shape, finding just the right size has been tricky so perhaps this info will help others.
 Hubby has a bit of a tummy so the first two pairs we had ordered were quite baggy in the legs and butt when bought using the waist measurements from the pj's sizing chart.  Because these jeans hold their shape after washing, shrinking down after laundering didn't change the fit which after finding the correct size, is a good thing.  Most of his pants are 36/38, so we had started with xl, then went to large and this last order was for medium which turns out perfect.  The earlier orders aren't going to waste though, I've inherited them myself:). Bottom line, if the man in your life is fit but fights with extra inches in the middle, order a smaller size.  Now that we've got the sizing right, I've been instructed to order a medium in every color!
summary: Great jeans, may run large for certain shapes.

I didn't buy this as a CCW bag and I don't think it would be handy for that purpose unless very little else was in it. I asked specifically about the "hair-on" portion and was told it was "genuine" although other parts were "PU" leather. There's not a hair anywhere, and a faint fragrance is the only hint of genuine leather. I like the looks and I'll get used to it, I think. The exterior side pockets are useless. The little flaps are sewn on in such a manner as to interfere with sliding anything out once it's inside. The pocket itself is so snug that it might hold a couple of business cards but little else. The interior pockets are adequate and zippered; I added small straps because the "handles" on two of the zippers are very small and unhandy. I like that there's a zipper for the overall bag, but wish it was anchored so I could close it with one hand instead of requiring both. Made in China, it's an attractive bag of a nice size.

This pearl necklace by Smitco LLC is very gorgeous. Its simple yet elegant. This necklace looks great as every day wear but it also has a sophisticated look so its perfect when dressing up for a special occasion. My necklace arrived in a purple gift box so its ready to give as a gift to a loved one.

The necklace set is very lightweight weighing about .2oz however its very thick and sturdy. The pendant is about 7/8 long and about .5 wide at the bottom. The pendant resembles a J or S shape. The top portion features seven crystals. The bottom portion features eleven crystals and has an ivory pearl set in the middle. I love that the pendant is 3 dimensional. The backside of the pendant is solid silver.

The chain slides through a large metal loop on the backside of the pendant. This gives the necklace an expensive look because it does not have a cheap looking loop attached to the top of the pendant. The chain is a box chain and the silver really shines. The chain that I received is 16 with a 2 extender that has an SCO tag on the end. It also has a medium sized lobster claw clasp which is easy to open. I do with the extender links were a bit larger as it can be difficult sometimes to get the clasp attached. My clasp also sticks sometimes so I have to be sure it closes all the way. Other than that, I have not experienced any other problems. The necklace is very gorgeous and compliments any outfit. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
Gave it to my Granddaugther for Christmas it is beautiful and very good quailty!

So impressed with the overall quality of this Silver Plated Simulated Single Pearl with Crystals Necklace from SmitCo LLC!
The "S" shaped setting reminds me of a Musical Note.  The pendant measures 7/8" long and 1/2" wide across the bottom portion.
There are 7 multi-faceted crystals set into in the top portion of the pendant and another 11 sparkling crystals set along the bottom portion, which accentuate the 5/16" simulated pearl very nicely.
The bale through which the 15" silver plated box chain threads is molded into the back of the pendant.
The box chain features an easy to manipulate lobster claw clasp on one end and a multiple link chain extender on the other, making it simple to position the pendant according to the neckline of the outfit I am wearing it with.
The reverse side of the pendant is nicely textured.
SmitCo LLC ships this beautiful necklace in a very nice gift box, complete with a satin ribbon on the box top.
They offer excellent customer service and guarantee every item they sell.
I received my pendant at a reduced cost in exchange for offering my unbiased, honest opinion and I would highly recommend both the necklace and the company that sells it.
summary: So impressed with the overall quality of this Silver Plated Simulated Single Pearl with Crystals Necklace from SmitCo LLC!

I feel so conflicted in giving this review.

The pros? The shirt really complements my figure. It's clingy in the right spots. The neckline is a bit plunging, so unless you put a camisole or tank underneath, your girls will be on display. The pockets on the chest are a nice addition, too. The material is thin, but that's good in the spring and fall. This blouse is quite long on me (I'm 5'5" and I can easily pull it down below my hip) and I prefer that.

The cons? This is going to be long. The sizing is way off. I'm normally a large, sometimes an XL. I ordered a 2XL and it fits well. I compared this blouse to other large and XL shirts in my closet and I'd say it's a small-ish XL or comparable to a generous large. The material is very stretchy, but the fit will be "tight," so order up at least one size, maybe two, depending on what you want.

The workmanship is poor. As I was pulling the sleeve off my arm, I heard a tearing sound, and saw that the sleeve's seam had split a little. I barely pulled at the sleeve, too. I examined it a little more and I could see there wasn't much stitching on the seam. Little reinforcement. I am not surprised it split.

I washed it on cold delicate cycle and hung to dry, thinking it was too fragile to really survive the dryer. Little did I realize, it was too fragile to survive the delicate cycle of the washer. See the picture I have attached - there's a tiny hole on the back behind where the tag is sewn. I'll be able to fix this pretty easily, but still, a hole after the FIRST wash?

There was also a lot of bleeding of the red dye. I hung this to dry to in my shower. I didn't realize the wet blouse was touching the shower curtain during the drying process. See the second picture. Reddish stain on my curtain. Crap.

In sum, I love how cute this blouse is, but it's kind of a disaster in every other respect. I can't really recommend it as anything other than a once-wear throwaway or a lounge-around-the-house deal.

update: after getting this wallet in the textured exterior finish, i was not happy with the product. but sending stuff back is such a pain in the butt. figured i'd just keep it, and get a new one later. so i wrote a bad review because the leather finish felt like plastic. i did not contact the company. well with-in a week, the company contacted me. they said to pick another wallet, and they would send it free. i chose one, they shipped it, i sent the old one back (on their dime). new wallet was much better. soft leather, looked good. i've been using it ever since. the company never once asked me to remove my review. they just wanted me to be happy. i respect that. so i'm updating my review. four stars for the wallet, and an extra star for a responsive company that actually cares if you are happy. thank you goes out to customer service.

reviewText:
This dark wooden watch is really beautiful to look at and is super comfortable to wear - so gossamer light, that I think it is even lighter than many plastic or rubber watches and certainly much lighter than metal band watches. The feel of wood on skin is much better than any other materials I have tried. Even with perspiration, it is comfortable. There is a downside as you probably won't wear this while swimming, but that is OK with me as I don't wear a watch while in the pool. The size is similar to a Rolex, so it can worn by both men and women (those who like oversized watches). The movement is accurate and the date function has a cyclops to magnify the date number.

reviewText:
I got these hoping to spice up the love life. My husband is what you would consider "vanilla" so this was a gentle way for me to add some different elements into our bedroom.
When these came I was so excited. We have owned the standard handcuffs before-hard metal and even worse hard metal covered with fuzzy cheap material. These are so comfortable. They are padded so you don't have any discomfort from wearing them. They also weren't intimidating to my husband.
I like that the chain is able to be removed so if you need to do some "repositioning" you don't have to fully remove one of the wrist cuffs. The chain also hold us to some resistance and I feel comfortable that it isn't just going to snap in two.
My wrists are what I believe to be a little thicker than some woman's and I had no issue with these fitting. There actually is a ton of room to expand in them, also room to go smaller. No matter what size you adjust them to there is adequate padding to be against your skin. For smaller sizing you just have to overlap the padding a bit to get the perfect closure. They close just like a belt and they are fairly simple to buckle close and easy to unbuckle.

I did receive this item at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion
summary: I got these hoping to spice up the love life. My husband is what you would consider ...

I really, really wanted this dress to work, as I fell in love with the pictures.

I bought this dress to wear to my cousin's black tie wedding. The package arrived early, and the dress was wrapped up nicely--kudos!

I sent them my sizing, so this dress was should have fit my body... That was not the case. I was swimming in fabric.

The cups were GIGANTIC. (peep the picture) I wear a 32D bra, but there was so much gapping between the cup and my chest. The built-in bra cups are also quite large. Coupled with long straps, I was basically hanging free. The waist was also too big, and the dress too long--even with 4" heels on, I was tripping on the skirt.

I wrote back to the manufacturer to ask if there was a mistake with the sizing, but they said that it was fine and offered me $20 to get it altered. Thankful for that!

I got tons of compliments on the dress, but I felt uncomfortable the whole night. This is not  a dress that I see myself wearing again, unfortunately.

PROS:

CONS:

Bottom line: If you don't wanna spend that much money and you aren't carrying anything that heavy and expensive inside, this should work for your needs. Otherwise, stay away.

reviewText: Really nice bag!!

I am a weekly business traveler and always looking for the perfect aged leather Breifcase.  I was a little skeptical considering this Breifcase was so inexpensive.  I wanted a small sized briefcase that was clean lines the size of a portfolio with handles to fit my iPad Air and possibly my 14 inch  Lenvono laptop.  I also wanted an exterior zipper for my cell phone, airline tickets, ear bugs and other items I'd need quickly.  I wanted a key slot inside and an interior zipper pocket for my chargers.  The briefcase fits ALL of the items listed above and isn't bulging at the seems, it actually all fits perfectly.

This briefcase had all of those things!!!!!!  The leather-like is very thick, polished (it comes a little to perfect) however it is the type of leather that will age VERY well.  The straps are sturdy and those as well are made of strong thick leather-like that will change to the perfect color after much use.

The briefcase has a flat bottom which was another must have so it stands straight up when place on the floor or table.

I am on my first trip as I write this and am excited to get some wear to leather and the Briefcase.  If I could rate this a 10 I would and for the price you can't go wrong!!!!

Great job seller, excellent product, it exceeds all of my expectations.  As I mentioned above I have numerous Briefcases, duffles and luggage due to weekly air travel and I am hoping this is the last Briefcase I ever buy its that awesome.
summary: The Perfect Breifcase, it is a MUST buy!!!

reviewText:
Previous reviews suggested to buy a size up, and I normally wear a tall medium. I'm 5'10" and 140 lbs., and purchased a 2xl so it would fit over layers. I have to say that it is slightly loose and baggy in the hip area, but overall the fit isn't bad- but folks, it's a 2XL! The sizing on this is a crapshoot.
 I bought this for the occasional cold weather in the South and when I visit family  in Chicago and the North East. I'm from the COLD North, and having spent a lifetime buying warm expensive coats, this one is a great deal. The quality and construction is fantastic for a coat at this price point. The material is solid and water resistant, but I would suggest treating the coat with an outdoor water resistant spray, much like you would treat hiking shoes or tents. The zipper and buttons, solid.
To address the fur hood attachment so many reviewers spoke of, mine was fluffy and fine to attach. It looks like a faux fur hood. It compliments the coat. It can be removed if one doesn't like theirs. It wasn't a deal breaker.
summary: A Great Purchase for the Price Point

The hood was easy to put on.  I am ready for every day of this New York City winter season with my 2 beautiful, warm and functional Valuker Down coats. I have my eye on the winter white one too!

reviewText: Very misleading.  XL fits size 6

I usually like my coats to fit a little big because living in Chicago, you need room for extra clothing.  Since everyone kept saying how small the size runs, I ordered an XL instead of the L I usually wear in coats.  It is actually bigger than I needed.  I think there are three things people need to consider if you are going to buy this coat.  First, this coat is not made like a "normal" parka.  Parkas are usually kind of square cut but is more of slim fitting coat.  Second, with this kind of coat, you have consider that it not for an overly curvy woman.  If you have larger breasts or bigger hips and butt, this coat is not for you.  Last, you need to always order a larger size for any clothing you get on Amazon, especially from a smaller/lesser known company.

reviewText: I received this unit and it arrived well packaged.  I was so excited to get this coat, I have been looking for one like it for forever, so this was like a kid waiting for Santa Claus to come.  I finally received it and it did fit, I normally were a size 6 or a medium in US sizes so I initially ordered a large but at the last minute waso able to contact the seller  (who responded quickly) that I wanted to change it to an xl, and they were able to accomodate me.  It does fit, it's a little baggy in the waist area, but not tons so I think a large may have possibly been too small.  The coat does pretty much look like the photo.  The bow on the front does not come all perfect like that, it is just a tie and you make your own bow, good luck getting it to look like the photo haha.  Also the coat is super soft, it almost feels like a thinner, cheaper version of cashmere.  Its very lightweight and won't provide a lot of warmth for being what I would consider a winter jacket.  That's not even why I dropped stars off though, the stars dropped because of the sewing on the item its pretty bad.  I'm tempted to return it because I paid a lot and although I receive it at a discount, it wasn't a very big discount and I still haven't decided if I will keep it or not.  A lot of the seem have large amounts of excess string hanging off and I'm afraid to cut them as I don't know if the whole coat will come apart or what.  Also one of the front buttons is probably 1/4 inch lower than what is supposed to be its match, so it doesn't look completely symmentrical, and at the bottom poration on one side of the skirt, it seems it wasn't sewn In the right place so it bunches in one area where it shouldnt.  The armpits on the coat are also sewn too large so if you raise your arm even slightly the whole coat goes up with it. The cost is still cute and I do love the style, the collar is good the ruffled skirt looks great minus that one defect, but I just don't know due to the quality of the sewing if I would recommend this at this point.  I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion.  I will enclose photos of the item as well as photos of the problems I mentioned in my review.

*UPDATE*:  And now the buckle falls off the belt randomly when the belt is open/undone.  The hinged section on the back of the buckle has teeth that dig into the belt to hold it in place, but there is nothing to hold the hinge closed.  Not a problem when you are actually wearing the belt (hinge is prevented from opening while being worn by being flat against your pants/waist) ... but it's NOT cool when you are in a public bathroom stall pulling up your pants and suddenly your belt buckle lands on the nasty floor and rolls into the next occupied stall.  Yuck. Minus another star.

reviewText:
Lowered four stars to one: Update:!!!! After one washing these look like nubby pajamas. After two washings these ARE now used as pajamas. Poor quality material choice I guess. HAND WASH maybe?
Original review.
I stated that this fit as expected because I read the reviews. I knew the pants would be longer then what they should be for the tops fit. Also remember these are not USA sizes. My daughter wears a solid 7-8 or 8. I got the 9-10 and the top fits the way she like...a little loose...she is almost 7 and 50lbs and 48". She is a very normal, average size.  Hope that helps you decide.
Now the waist IS a little big and of course the length. However, 1) where the out may be big on one child it may not on another as it all depends of the build. 2) the pants are a very simple hem. And we are use to pinching the waist with a few stiches on her sweats.
Also, this is NOT a heavy sweat suit material. It's more like a softer, heavier tee shirt material. It is perfect for year around in Michigan, minus winter at recess she would wants her snow pants or footless tights/leggings outside.
We got the yellow and blue and it is 100% true to the picture! It is unique for our styles in the US and incrediably cute! I only hope it washes well! I don't dry any of her clothes because I buy a lot on Amazon and EBay and so we have brands from all over and I just have Berger luck not drying.
If you like the look online of this set you will love it in person! I am going to buy the orange and blue for my daughter  and the pink and gray for my niece.
Note: the 9-10 has a tag that has the European size 140.
I have it 4 stars because I think they should work on having the items match in size better.
UPDATE:
As I mentioned, I liked it so much (still haven't washed it yet as this review is only 2 days old) I bought the other two colors but chose to get the orange in the next size for next year.
Well, pictures attached, the sizes are practically identical. I don't have time to measure right now but I carefully compared the two against each other. The only somewhat difference is the width of the shirt and the tiniest bit in the waist but being eleastic that would matter much. It's possible the shirt MIGHT has the slightest length difference but considering that the shirt runs smaller then the pants and the pants are literally the exact same. (I even carefully payed them out and compared inseams. Identical.) It makes way more sense to buy the larger size and get a shirt that may have a bit more size to it to match the size of the pants better. Now this is the 9/10 (140) and the 11/12 (150) sizes. If your buying the 140 already expecting it to be big you would be fine (as I stayed the pants are the same anyway and you could easily hem these) because the little bit of extra room in the shirt of the 11/12 may make it to baggy for a child on the small end of the 9/10 size. Again my daughter is exactly 48" and 50lbs and proportioned very averagely throughout. The 9/10 was perfect except pants length and that's why I wished the shirt was larger. See pictures also.

I was offered the chance to receive this product in exchange for my time spent reviewing it.  I ordered a size 2 after looking at the size charts and that seems to be right on.  The arms and shoulder are slim/small and it would be a tight fit across the chest if you're large busted, but if you're on the smaller side (as I am!) and wear a size small in US sizes than small is what you're looking for (I am 5'4" and 115 lbs).  The material is a silky smooth polyester, and the way the color gradiates down the shirt is fun.  The seams are finished nicely and I think this will wash well, for the price it's a fun wardrobe addition!  I just wish it was a little more fitted through the torso - the title of "sexy slim" had me expecting it to be a bit more form fitting.  There are chest darts, but other than that it falls straight.  It is long sleeved so if you want a three-quarter look like seen in the picture you'll need to roll the sleeves - which is fine, I like the versatility of being able to go either way with it.
summary: Great feeling polyester and love the blue color gradiant styling

The cost, quality and cuteness of these socks do not make up for the fact that they are too small. They receive two stars for cuteness and being mostly wool of an acceptable thickness. Knowing the measurements of this sock, toe to heel, height of the band, circumfrence of the band and sock width, would have helped me to make my purchase decision. I would not have purchased this sock due to the following measuremts:

1. Toe to heel: 7 and 2/8 inches unstretched
2. The elastic band: 6 inches in all around unstretched
3. Height of tubing from heel to the elastic band: 5 inches
4. Width of tubing of sock from heel to band: 6 and 1/4 inches all around

I would recommend these socks for children or slender adolescents. They shouldn't be advertised as adult women's socks, but the manufacturer is in China and clearly based sizing on their petite models who are most likely Asian. I'm baffled at their persistence in this hit and miss practice.
summary: Check The Measurements Before Buying (I Provide Them In This Review)

I've yet to resize the watches, but I'm skeptical of potential quality-based issus arising. I Hope returns are made simple and that the 2nd watch holds up.

i like the watch but had to have 4 links removed from the band and now it fits just right.

My husband is huge into wood work, and I love getting pieces of jewelry that he actually notices. He was stunned by the beauty of this Ideashop women's zebra wood watch. What I love about wood is the grains in it. It makes every piece, even from the same tree, a little different from every other piece.

This watch is beautiful. It has just enough sparkle which makes it really classy. The watch is easy to adjust, you just pull out the tab like any other watch and twist it till it's right. The watch is very comfortable, and even though the wood is very strong and sturdy it feels soft against my skin.

When I received the watch it was a little big so I had to remove two link to make it the perfect fit. The watch comes in a nice box with a little pillow that is perfect for storage while you aren't wearing it.

The watch has a clasp that you pinch on each side of the band to extend open. Very easy to open.

This watch is beautiful and so different from any watch I have seen before, I have gotten many compliments on it. I am very happy with it.

I received this watch at a discount in exchange for a honest and unbiased review.

I accidently got this watch thinking it was a men's watch.  While waiting for it, I thought about what I was going to do with it...give it to my 10 year old who's been buggin about getting his own watch or maybe my mother-in-law for her birthday.  I don't normally wear a watch...don't wear anything on the wrist of the hand that I write with.  Besides, when I do go out, I always want to wear some cute bracelet.  Now, I got all in one!!!  The appearance of the watch far exceeded my expectations.  It is not easy to find a watch that works well but is also unique looking.  Not only is it unique to well known brand watches, it's one of a kind with the grain of the wood being one of a kind. I can't believe how they use texture & color to make such a statment in this piece...it's truly a piece of art!  Light weight and yet, not a delicate watch considering the wood they chose to make it from. Big without being chunky or thick to get in the way of movement or clothes. Packaging and presentation in the gift box makes it even more special, IF I still wanted to give it away. The watch comes with plenty of links in the wrist, so it fits pretty much anyone  you simply remove links to make the watch fit as needed. I fits my very small wrist a little loss & also my husband's rather large wrist (I think the thought of him stealing the watch from me HAS crossed his mind) and while its designed for women, it would still make a fashion statement when worn by a man!  I, my husband & my boys love this watch.  It really would make an amazing gift for anyone and has proven to be a great conversation starter aleady! It gets a lot of comments and I am now envied by my friends...I guess I already know what I'm getting all of them for Christams this year.  Oh, I checked, normally watches like these can easily exceed $200 with other companies so they'll think I spent much more on their gift.  I can't say a mistake has ever made me this happy!  I received this watch for free for my unbias honest opinion.
summary: Wow, beautiful tecture & style all in a wearable piece of art!!!

reviewText:
Classic never goes out of style these sunglasses are so cute. I ordered the leopard print frames with brown lenses. The frames almost look brown until the light shines on them, and then the leopard print pops out. The frames are really sturdy along with stylish. I love the way that the brown lenses pair perfectly with the browns in the leopard print on the frame. Everything about these sunglasses has the vantage feel they even have a silver inlay on each side of the lenses. They come in a pull tie carrying bag that is made out of micro fiber. Perfect for cleaning the lenses safely without scratching them. These sunglasses don't come with nose pads because they don't need them. Honestly I forgot that I had them on serval times throw out the day. They can be worn by a man or a women. My son has been eyeballing them, and he looks pretty good in them! I though that ordering leopard print I would be safe from him "using" them, but I was wrong. I love that they are so solid I keep them in the glove box in the carrying bag, and don't have to worry about them getting bent on accident. They are a great size for all face shapes and sizes. My son that loves them too is 12. We are extremely happy with these vantage sunglasses.

I received WODISON 80's Classic Style Vintage Wayfarer Nerd Leopard Print Frames with Brown Lenses Glasses Sunglasses at a discount or for free for my honest and unbiased review. That has not swayed my review in any, way my review is 100% my own experience with this product.

purchased to match backpack which I turned into camera bag. I noticed that newer Vera Bradley patterns are lined with slippery nylon instead of the beloved complementary patterned cotton, so I am careful to make sure that the photo includes an inside look of the lining before I buy. I accidentally purchased a newer pattern and I hate using it so that's when I learned my lesson to carefully inspect the photos.. VB now does this trick of nylon lining because it's cheap, on their newer patterns so I tend to look for the older patterns like this one. Both backpack and cross-body bags for this pattern are nicely lined with complementary pattern cotton!
summary: One of the last older VB patterns lined with beautiful pattern cotton quilting-- newer ones have cheap nylon lining, beware~

One thing to watch out for: the metallic "foil" look fades pretty quickly.  Just wearing this top diminishes its sparkle; washing it takes most of the metallic stuff out of the fabric.  At this point my top barely looks metallic at all -- but it's still fun to wear.

It came with removable straps they were just a little hard to put on. I'm 5'6" 130 lbs. and I got the medium; the bottom fit perfectly but the top was somewhat big. There is a lot of push up padding in the cups that is not removable.

The bathing suit you order is the bathing suit you get.  For the price, it is what you would expect.  First of all the color is great.  It looks exactly like the picture, which is wonderful.  The netting detail on the top and on the sides of the bottom looked very good too.  There was no loose stitching.  Looks very good.  However, the bottoms are not neoprene.  Which was fine for me because I have never worn a neoprene bathing suit before.  But if you are looking for a neoprene bottom this is NOT it.  The top was okay.  In the cup area, everything fit.  I am a C cup and got a medium and it fit nicely.  However the band that goes around you to clasp in the back did not fit me.  If there had been an option to make it tighter it would have fit perfect.  But, since the cup part of the top fit me well, I could not get a small.  It would not work. I ordered a medium in both the top and bottom.  The bottoms fit very well.  just the top didn't fit around the band area correctly.  Over all, it is an okay bathing suit for the price and it looks very nice.  I hope this helps anyone!

I've used this bag on a number of trips and have had no issues with anything breaking like other customers have experienced.  The bag holds a deceivingly large amount of things as evidence by the images and list below.  This bag easily fits in an airplane overhead storage, even on the smaller planes where the roll aboards have to be checked plane side.  My only issue is that the shoulder strap can be uncomfortable after carrying the bag for a while. It would be nice if there was some sort of padding.
Items in bag:
1 pair of boots
1 pair of jeans
5 t-shirts
1 pair of gym shorts
5 pairs of underwear
5 pairs of socks
1 bar of soap in box
1 quart size ziploc bag with toiletries
1 puzzle book
3 boxes of Maple Cream Cookies

reviewText: Love it! Very well made, durable! Unlike other conceal purses that I have, you can not tell I am carrying any thing!

I'll be honest...my expectations for the quality of this bag were moderate, but at less than $40, and with Amazon's great return customer service, what did I have to lose? Well, I'm pleased to report that my expectations were exceeded and then some.

The materials, finishes, size and assembly are all very high quality. The purse is sturdy and roomy without being overly bulky. I hate a purse that can double as a diaper bag. The weight and adjustable strap are perfect. Plenty of interior compartments with smooth-working zippers and the style is just plain fun.

My biggest concern would be whether the conceal pocket on the back would truly conceal my handgun, or would you clearly see the shape hidden inside. No worries there! This is a truly conceal carry bag. I may have to get the red one, too!
I love it

My wife likes the purse however, the gun compartment, which is formed for a gun, has some issues.

1. There is to much material in the pouch. This causes the gun to catch when removing it.
2. The material is not sewed at the top all the way across. Just where the zipper is. This causes the gun mussel to point down in the purse making it sit as basically a 45 degree angle. That also contributes to issues removing the weapon.

This is a nice purse but don't expect to be able to draw a weapon out quickly even after you get your hand on it. Perhaps if it were made of a smoother material.
summary: You should not have to use 2 hands to remove a gun...

reviewText:
i actually really like the material of this shirt. It is a stretchy blend, but not too stretchy looking. be aware it runs VERY small. I usually wear a size small or medium shirt. I saw that they ran small and read reviews before hand so I knew they ran really small. I will attach a picture of the shirt in front of a size small long sleeve T shirt I own from The Gap for a size comparison. bought an XL and it fits me perfectly, but I have never before bought an XL so I was lucky I read reviews first. It honestly seems like child sizing to be honest. You should also be aware that it fits short.

I was annoyed to find that right out of the package there were strings hanging off, one was pretty bad. I will attach a picture that shows the threading. It is not just one small thread, it is a cluster of a bunch. I will have to cut them, but I am worried it will make the shirt unravel. I am definitely worried about how the shirt will hold up when I wash it.

Overall, I like how the material looks and feels. I think it could make a great addition to my wardrobe as a simple, black v-neck tee. I am hoping it holds up and does not completely fall apart since the workmanship does worry me a bit. I will update my review if it does fall apart.

SmitCo Heart with center stone is really pretty and not overwhelming. It's just the right size to wear alone or with other necklaces.
Some reviews mention the chain is short but with items you want to stand out, it should be higher on the neck and not lower. I know this from having worked for a custom Jeweler for years when women would always ask for a shorter chain for pieces such as this because you want eyes up, not lower!
When the light catches it, the sparkle is amazing and the weight is comfortable -  it isn't going to bend or fold like silver and won't tarnish either.
The design won't have stones falling out: the center is held by usual prongs and surrounding ones are channel set so they will stay in place just as any design like this would if you paid $$$ from a jewelry store. It's easy to clean too - if the stones seem dull, drop it in a small glass with windex overnight, scrub a little with an old toothbrush and its shiny again!

I've always been happy with SmitCo's line of what they sell and they do care about their customers, it's why I keep ordering things for me and my Granddaughter for them. Highly recommend!
summary: Just the right size and really sparkles!!!!

reviewText: I love this top! I was happy when I was received it fast and furious!!! lol  I ordered a large,and it's a little snug,but nothing a good stretch can't fix.  The black is pure black,the lace matches the color of the shirt perfect. I love how my skin shows under the lace. I wore this item with a nice one button black jacket with slacks. It's very appropriate for a work setting,or a dinner out:) If you're looking for a cute top for under or alone layers,this is the top for you:) I would say order a size bigger than your normal ordering size. Better to be safe that sorry.

I ordered a large which is what I generally wear in American clothing. I did not realize that these sizes are geared more towards chinese sizing. I always find when I order products from the other side of the world, I need to buy at least 2 sizes bigger. I just had a baby 3 months ago and plan to use the baby weight soon, so hopefully I will be able to wear it soon because it is absolutely gorgeous. It's really stretchy and definitely form fitting. I would just make sure that you check the sizing chart before you order! I did not so that is my fault. To give you an idea i am 5 feet 6 inches and weight 175 lbs. Large did not fit. I'm not really that big in the bust or tummy, but I couldn't get the shirt on for fear of ripping the lace, which by the way gives this shirt a bit of a sexy feel.

Shipping was prompt. I would say it was here in about 5 days. I can't remember exactly but it was beautifully packaged. Wrapped in tissue paper and fold it up all neat and pretty. It says a lot about a company when they hand package the product they are selling! I did take a picture of the packaging and hope to get it uploaded soon.
summary: Beautiful shirt, just wish it fit.

reviewText:
After reading the reviews about sizing up I ordered up one size to a size large since I normally wear medium.  Also, with lace, not knowing if it will stretch or not I had planned on ordering up anyway.  Please be warned this top definitely runs small.  The large fit me like a glove.  Since the lace inserts in the sleeves are attached to a cotton (95%) spandex (5%) blend there is wiggle room.  There is also a lace inset in the back.  This is a beautiful top that is certainly curve-contouring and will get you noticed.  The lace adds a sexy seductive touch without being revealing.

I purchased the black since just about everything in my closet is black and love it.  I like that there is a wide selection of colors to choose from.  You can dress it up or down most certainly and itll look great for date night or any night.  I plan on hand washing mine to prevent it from getting weathered in the washing machine.

I told them all that she got it on amazon. The print on the skirt is nice and crisp and the picture is SO cute!  Who doesn't love The Lion King?  The waist band was a little bunched up in back where they had sewn elastic in  to make the waist band smaller. I'm a seamstress, so I can see how this could have been done a little nicer.  But, no one is going to notice that otherwise. There is no hem in this as it's made out of fabric that doesn't ravel and it doesn't need to be hemmed.  It will not ravel or wear at the hem.  We have washed it and dried it many times and it still looks brand new.  It is a SUPER cute skirt and if you're thinking of getting it, get it!

reviewText: I bought this bag in the rose, and its a vibrant, happy shade of dark pink that is fun without being juvenile or aggressive. The size, I believe, is pretty perfect. I can hold a good sized wallet, a cell phone, lipsticks, hand sanitizer, a FULL key fob, a packet of tissues, receipts, and a travel packet of wipes (with kids that is a must carry!) in the two zippered compartments. The center pocket area does not zip, there is a magnetic closure, and its perfect for a baby hat or a burp cloth when you are shopping, very handy. You don't even need to look to reach and grab in the center area. It doesnt weigh much on its own, so its not bad to carry, even full. The straps all appear well made with good length, both on the shoulder and arm straps. The purse seems durable, thus far I haven't had any issues and I have been using it about three weeks. The gun metal colour of the hardware is a great change from a silver or gold tone and I really like that, also. Essentially, it is perfect. Buy it. You will love it. And thank me ;-)

I received this bag in the hot pink color. Beautiful. Do be aware when you order this bag that it is not made of real leather, but rather a PVC type leather (artificial). This has it's advantages (strong, easy to clean, vegan, animal-cruelty free). Because of the material though, there may be some odor to it when you first receive it. Just let it air out and the smell should completely dissipate over a day or so. This bag looks luxurious and rich. Anyone could be fooled by the material and easily be convinced this is real leather. It is soft to the touch with an incredibly smooth texture. I have 3 bags by this company and all 3 bags follow the above mentioned description. This particular bag has a strap and as such can also be worn as a cross-body style bag. The bag closes securely with a zipper and has two main pockets on the inside. Large enough for your daily essentials it is the perfect bag for casual use. My favorite part of this bag is the color. It is fun and bright yet appropriate for any season. As a disclosure I received a free bag in exchange for my review. I rate it 5 stars based on my personal use and experience with this product. While not real leather, it looks fancy and beautiful enough to look great with any outfit. Would recommend!

Based on the recommendations in the description (which compares a Large in this brand to a standard US Men's Small), the pair I ordered should have been long, loose-fitting and a bit baggy. That's a what I wanted (I bought them to use as cozy lounge pants, so I wanted them baggy.)

I wear a women's small, so usually a men's small is pretty baggy on me. I ordered the Large in these, and they actually fit like a women's small! Whcih would be great if it wanted a fitted jogger! But it's not.

If you are a man who typically wears a size small, I'd go up to an XL or XXL (the biggest) unless you want a slim-fit jogger. At 5'4, there was barely enough length in a size Large for these to comfortably hit my ankles. The model must be shorter than me! I weigh about 125 pounds as well, and these were barely what I'd describe as loose. My husband is 6'2 and 200, and based on the size of the Large pair, I highly doubt an XXL would fit him. They'd be capri-length, for one thing! These would be great if marketed to petite women, but I'll be sending them back for something that actually matches the description.
summary: These fit like women's pants (I'm a woman)

reviewText: When I first received this product, I was excited to give it a try. Im always looking for something to add to the bedroom and with our upcoming wedding, I figured this might be a great idea for the night of the wedding. But upon closer inspection, I realized that its extremely poorly made. And by that, I mean I feel that they took scrap pieces of fabric and sewed it together on the bottom covering part that lays against the legs and splits up. The top half is pretty sound and flattering as well as fitting correctly. The lace design is classy and overall, its comfortable. However, the bottom portion is horribly cut. There are jagged edges. The sides are unevenly cut. There is a spot where it was cut into like the shape of a mountain. The seams are left exposed - they aren't folded over and sewn to complete the design. Overall, it was a horrible cut. The bikini thong is in perfect condition. Not much fabric to it but what else do you expect ;) I gave this a 3 star review because though the bottom definitely has its flaws, the top is sewn correctly, the fit is correct in proportion to the sizing I bought and the length, and the thong is in perfect condition as well. I hope in the future the seller pays more attention to the cutting of the bottom pieces. I strongly felt like mine was sewn together with scrap pieces. Thanks!
summary: Bottom not cut straight, jagged pieces

Looks wise, it is spot on with what you see in the pictures. The chain is extremely reflective and overall it looks like a pretty piece of jewelry. Build wise, the quality is surprisingly good for something in the $30 price range (the price I paid for this item on Amazon). Obviously this doesn't have the looks or build quality of a piece of jewelry in the hundreds of dollar price range but it does hit above its price in both departments.

The only negative (and the reason for the four star rating) is that some assembly is required for this and the presentation/shipping was not what i expected. It comes in a standard jewelry box (box looks/feels nice, which is great at this price point) but is not assembled and inside the box is two pieces (the chain and the pendant) in small plastic bags just haphazardly thrown into the box (not the greatest). While the assembly wasn't an issue (just threading the chain through the pendant) it is something to be aware of before presenting it to someone (and something that should have been mentioned in the description).

Overall can't really go wrong with this. Its a nice piece of jewelry that hits above it's $30 price point, just remember to actually put it together before giving it to someone.
summary: The chain is extremely reflective and overall it looks like a pretty piece of jewelry

I love AmoreWing products! The company is so easy to work with and good at communicating, their products are true and real, handmade, and the cord they use for necklaces and bracelets is extremely durable and will take a lot of wear and tear before snapping - if ever. This unikite and lava bracelet is beautiful. Its a bit larger mm beads then I imagined which is my fault for not looking into it. Because the beads are so big, the bracelet fits perfectly without using any tension of the wire. It can sit slack on the wrist. That being said, if you have a really skinny wrist typically, then this might be too big for you. It still wouldn't fall off though. That component is where wveryones opinion will be different. I'm excited to wear this... It really does look like I spent a boat load more and went to "jarred"!
And if I'm wearing this in a wedding you have to get the idea of how nice it is in person and that the picture doesn't do it justice because there will be a million selfies of us on the Internet and by the photographer!

This most definitely is not some tacky or gaudy piece of costume jewelry. I would highly recommend this necklace to anyone considering it.

As a disclaimer, I did receive this item at a discount in exchange for an honest, objective review. Overall really cute and fun birthday hat to wear so everyone can know its your special day. i also like that it came with relighting candles after you blow them out. I like that the hat has fabric candles on top which makes it even better. I did receive this hat complimentary for my honest thought and unbiased review.

The hat fits nicely and it looks cute. We will keep it for many birthdays. Feels sturdy enough even though it is felt. Not worried about it falling apart. The candles are fun and I will use them twice. I did receive this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All of the opinions in this review are 100% my own and are based on my own experiences. I was not compensated in any other way.

When I saw these pearls as a holiday "Lightning Deal," I thought they'd be perfect for diversifying my jewelry.  The necklace looked really neat in the picture, and I really liked the colors.

I thought they were much less underwhelming when I received them, though.  There are two strands of "potato" shaped pearls. The way they lay on each strand of the necklace, though, is kind of "kinky".  You'd definitely have to twist the necklace or intertwine the strands prior to wearing if you want it to look anything like the picture.

I knew they wouldn't be round nor of flawless quality, but I didn't think they'd have noticeable rings (?  Seams? or whatever you'd call them) around the middle.  This characteristic is much more prominent on the beige colored pearls; actually, at first I thought it was thin plastic adhered to the pearls to keep them together. If they were cheaper I'd probably keep them, but I just feel like I can get more uniform and attractive jewelry elsewhere.  (And, interestingly enough, the "Lightning Deal" price is now the current Prime price..)

reviewText:
I purchased this Hellomama Chic Solid Half Sleeve Bodycon Dress and its really well made.  This is the first product Ive purchased from this seller and I am glad I took a chance on them.  Its a really nice dress for work - sexy and form fitting, but classy and the hemline comes just above my knees.

The color is a nice royal blue and the quality and stitching are very nice.  I washed and air dried it with no issues.  Its not really a summer dress unless you work in the AC because of the long sleeves and thicker material.

Sizing - Im 55, 140 lbs and typically wear a size 5/6.  I ordered a medium and it fits well, but I have to wear a shaping garment underneath.  I definitely couldn't have gotten away with anything smaller, so would recommend ordering a size up from your normal size.

Thanks to the seller for providing this at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Very Nice Dress For The Office

Very Soft;  Very Warm & Stylish ... Unique design:
One side of the scarf measures 31" long, the other, longer size measures 59".
These measurements are taken from the middle seam, at the back of the hood, to the very end of the scarf.
The pockets are about 9" deep & are big enough for large hands. The pockets are cozy & warm.
The entire scarf has two layers/thicknesses which helps prevent the cold air from blowing through & keeps me warmer.
Wrap  the long end around your neck &  bring it forward.
If you're cold & need to use the pockets, you'll notice that the scarf could be a little longer.
(When you first put your hands in the pockets your elbows will be bent.)  To remedy this, put your hands in the pockets & pull down a little bit.  This tightens the scarf around your neck which also will help lower the pockets.  Depending on your height this might bring the pockets down to a comfortable length.  If you're tall, more than likely your arms will be bent at the elbow when you use the pockets.
Measuring from the middle of your neck to your hand  should give you an idea of how this scarf will fit you (don't include your hand in the measurement).

My 5' 3" friend measures 31"  from the middle of her neck, down her arm to her hand.  When she wraps the long end around her neck, & puts her hands in the pockets, her elbows are slightly bent.  If she lengthens the scarf by putting her hands in the pockets & straightening her arms, the scarf tightens around her neck & the pockets are just right for her.  Her arms can be fully extended & the neck is still comfortable.

This hooded scarf with pockets is great for cold days.  It is soft, warm & comfortable.  The pockets are 9" deep . My whole hand - up past my wrist fits inside.  Snug & warm.
If you're tall, this scarf might not work for you.

Review Sample Provided

I almost forgot to mention:
I was surprised to see a Symbol of Traditional Chinese Culture included. Fashion Land included a Chinese Knot in the scarf's packaging.
An informative note explained:
"Chinese knot is unique Chinese folk manual techniques adornment,
Chinese knot after thousands of years of evolution knot arts has been called the masses enjoy refined colorful art.
The combination of different modelling marks a strong full-bodied wishes, praise & convey faithfully zhicheng prayers & good wishes."
Thank you for the good wishes, Fashion Land.
summary: Very soft, very warm, hooded scarf with 9" deep pockets.  Unique design
