reviewText:
I thought this jacket was a very nice, light wear jacket.  It has a warm, soft inside liner.  The zipper was a bit rough, feeling wise.  It zipped without any problems though.  Based on the picture I was expecting a long fit jacket, it was not however.  It was standard fit. I usually wear a XL so I bought the jacket larger XXL ( just to be on the safe side).  It did not fit as expected around my waist.  The sleeves did fit perfect.  I gave the jacket to my sister and it fit her very well.  She wears a medium and it fit her perfectly.  I would recommend ordering one size larger at least.

Disclosure-I received this item at a discount in return for an honest review. My review is not biased due to the discount.

I absolutely love this. I read the previous reviews and based on those, I am a size small and so I got the size Medium. Fits wonderfully. It is made with extremely soft material. The color red is pretty much a dark red, such as shown in the picture. The sleeves go all the way down passed my wrists. The arms are not small at enough. In a size medium for a size small person, it doesnt fit snug, but fits nice and comfortable with room to move all around. The inside lining is a super soft medium grey fluffy wool feeling material that goes up into the hood. I wanted to wear it to bed the first night I had it. I live in California and in the mornings when it has been 40 degrees, it has kept me warm and comfortable.

I received this item at a discounted price for my honest feedback.  Honestly, I wouldnt have bought this originally, but I can tell you after receiving it, If they have this jacket in any other colors, I want them all.

Before I ordered I always read at least 25 or so reviews, you just never know and I will say the majority were very accurate.  so I will start with delivery.  I received it on time and the packaging that was mentioned in the majority of the reviews were very accurate,  they do take pride in packaging which is a great part to the over all presentation.  I was very impressed on the size and what this little purse actually holds.  I transferred what was in my shoulder back and it all fit.  I even have a portable charger that is not huge but not sleek either but fit great and did not add bulk.  The purse is very soft and not cheesy looking.  I really hate purses that are not actually real leather and are stiff.  I love how there is one zipper on top that opens up to the three open compartments inside.  There is actually 5 if you consider extra slots to keep say receipts or extra cc or gum so that does make it very nice. People were also commenting on the smell.  There  is a smell to it that is to me not natural leather but still not bad like some people had commented.  I do want to say the one thing I am not very happy with is the color that is why I am only giving 4 stars.  In going through the reviews before I purchased I was trying to get a read on how the color's were once they received the purse but could only find 1 comment on the purple one.  I will say that I ordered the brown/tan thinking summer is coming and that is a great neutral color for summer.  I was less than impressed.  In the light it is more of a burnt orange not brown.  I have had a purse in that color before and it is a good color but still not what I was expecting but would not return because I do love everything else about it and it's not so bad that I just would refuse to use it.  I really would recommend this purse to others.  Sorry for the ramble but hope this helps.
summary: they do take pride in packaging which is a great part to the over all presentation

reviewText:
My baby is only 11 months old but she's a little chunky so I normally buy bigger sizes of clothes for her. I got this shirt with the cat on it and was surprised when it finally arrived that the tag says it's a jumping beans brand. That's the brand that I usually get for most of my baby's clothes because they're comfy and has a nice fabric. So I immediately compared this with the same brands that I have where I bought them at a company that exclusively sells them. The tag from this shirt looks way different from the tag of the jumping beans shirt that I bought at the store. I don't know if this is a real jumping beans brand or not but I should tell you that the quality of this shirt is same as the others that I have. The fabric is 100% made of cotton. It has 2 snaps on the neck area so it'll be easier for you to put this on to your baby. I got the 18M size and it fits perfectly in my baby. It keeps her warm during this winter season. She feels comfortable wearing it too. This is a great quality product and worth the buy. I am pleased with my purchase and definitely recommend this.

I ordered this long sleeved purple shirt with the horse design for my toddler. This is a pretty shirt, can't go wrong with pretty horses. This shirt is not too thick and perfect for this years winter weather. I was surprised to see it was a Jumping Beans brand tag in the shirt, which is sold at a major department store. I Ike that this shirt is made of cotton and have snaps at the collar to allow more room to put the shirt over the head. I like the horse and it seems to have good and durable stitching. My daughter will probably wear this shirt with jeans, sweats, and leggings. It matches a few bottoms in her wardrobe. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText: My daughter absolutely loved this shirt, she calls it her cat shirt. She is your average sized 2 year old, she is 32lbs and usually wears a 3T. I got her the 3T in this shirt and it fits perfectly. I love how well it is made. It is a thick and durable material and all of the stitching is done very nicely. The cat on this shirt is super cute and it is perfect for my daughter because she loves animals. It has little buttons on the collar but we never have to undo them when I put it on her. I received this at a discount in exchange for my unbiased opinion but my opinions have not been swayed in any type of way. I plan on getting her other animals in this shirt as well because she loves it.

I'm a bit torn on this shirt. The design is super cute, the designs remind me of Mini Boden, so I wanted to love it since it's so much cheaper than the designer brands.
My daughter is 4 and many times she can wear either a 5 or 6 in shirts so I ordered the 6 in the dog design so that she can perhaps get two winters use out of it. The sizing is as expected and is similar to her other shirts. What stops me from loving this is that even the size 6 came with two snaps at the neck. Normally when a child is this old you don't need snaps at the neck to fit the shirt over the head. So I found this really odd, and makes it look more like a baby or toddler shirt and not something for a 4-6 year old. Another thing that really threw me off was it came with a Jumping Beans tag. Now, normally you find those at Kohl's, and even the listing says the designs are owned by Fiream so I found it super odd that they would be on a Jumping Beans shirt.
So, I'd say if you have a younger child the shirts are great as the snapped neck is to be expected. For an older child such as my daughter I wouldn't recommend these unless your child has a really large head and needs the snaps...
The design is cute, my daughter loves the dog. The fabric is 100% cotton and soft. So I do like it, it just isn't love like I had hoped.

Just this past week we had a 40 degree, sunny day with minimal wind, wearing only a tank top underneath and I walked our very long driveway to the mailbox with very little chill. Running and bicycling are activities I actively participate in, so good and breathable running clothes are a MUST! Because the colder weather is approaching I wanted to purchase longer pants that way I can still take a part in my daily exercise. The Neleus Womens compression legging comes in a set of two workout pants. One with a red strip and one with a blue strip. The compression legging is made of 85% polyester and 15% spandex, which makes the fabric very stretchy. The pants are solid black with a colored strip that runs along the top of the pants. They stayed fitted to your form and don't flare at the ends. The workout pants are extremely elastic, comfortable, and breathable. The legging keeps me dry, fits amazingly, and are very comfortable. The only negative I have is that it is a bit thin and I feel a bit exposed if I bend down.  I received this product at a discount for an honest and unbiased review.
These leggings are amazing! They are a nice thick material that works for any type of exercise or casual wear. The fit very well.

reviewText:
This shirt is exactly as I was hoping it would be. After reading all the reviews I decided to order two sizes larger than I normally wear and I'm super glad I did. I usually wear a U.S. size medium in most shirts so I ordered an XL in this shirt and it fits perfectly. I could have stood to have one more size up (just because I like my shirts with some wiggle room) but the size I have fits great. I definitely recommend ordering two to three sizes up (three if you're a bustier girl or like your shirts a little loose) but overall I'm happy with the shirt.
The only downfall I noticed is that the lace around your neck is a little rough and scratchy. Wearing the shirt all day might cause that lace to rub your neck raw. To fix that, I'm going to take a thin piece of black ribbon and sew on the inside of the shirt, where the lace touches my neck, so I'll have a soft line there instead of the rough lace.
summary: Shirt runs very small order AT LEAST two sizes larger, if not three.

I started out by reading all the books, then watching all the Harry Potter movies. I got my granddaughter, grandson and daughter interested in them also. We would watch the movies at different times, but always came back together to talk about them. The wands were always a topic of conversation and how neat it would be to own one. All these years later, I stumbled across this wand from Amazon. My granddaughter still likes re-reading the books and talks about the story often and still mentions the fact that she would like a wand.

To begin with the box it comes in is so nicely made with a stain lining and an indention that fits the wand perfectly. The company even sent me an email if I needed to contact them. It came all the way from China and was still here before the first possible anticipated date by two days, well wrapped and boxed. Even though this is my first purchase of a wand, I thought it was a great price. Since then I have looked at other companies that sell this type of thing and no one came close.

The actual wand is so pretty in green and black. The wand it made of resin. Elegantly designed handle and markings to make it look like wood. Looking at the movie, I would say this could have been the original wand that Harry used.

This product was purchased for free or at a reduced price for a honest and unbiased review/opinion.

It is well made and will make a wounderful addation to anyone's collection.

summary: Very cool looking wand and a great replica

reviewText:
For such a silly product, I have a lot to say about this wand.

First of all, I purchased this wand for a friends birthday who LOVES Luna Lovegood (she made the radish earrings and all!). Online, the wand looked good. It seemed to be a resin wand with a nice case, and even though its not WB approved, it appeared to be of similar quality to the ones being offered at almost three times the price.

When the wand arrived, I found this wasn't true. The first wand I received was broken in the container. The box seemed undamaged, but somehow, the flimsy want had shattered in three pieces. When I saw this, I contacted the seller, who then told me they would ship me an new one PLUS an additional wand. Nearly a week went by, and I had not heard from them. I contacted the seller 10 days later. They said they had no record of my purchase, but that if I could prove it, they would send the two wands.

Needless to say, after I sent the confirmation, they finally sent a wand to me. Notice: a wand. I finally received my intact wand (in a very crushed up box) on June 8, after my initial order was placed on April 08. Needless to say, I didn't want to give my friend a broken box or a broken wand.
It should also be noted that the second wand that I got, the box was badly printed, the magnets did not keep the box closed, and there was no script reading Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince on the front.

After this whole ordeal, I inspected the wand and found that it had bits on metal embedded in it. The paint job was shoddy, and I found myself regretting buying the wand. Fortunately, with a bit of ingenuity and some paint, I was able to make the wand look a bit more like Lunas second wand, and I recovered the box with some beautiful fabric and paint to make it look more like a case Luna might use.

Overall, I had a meh experience with this. The product wasn't great, the experience was bad- BUT I did at least get the wand in the end.

Basically it boils down to this. If you're looking for a ready made wand thats perfect for your costume and a display box, this is NOT the wand for you. If you're okay with doing a little DIY and you just want the wand shape and a box to begin with, Go ahead! For the price, you get what you pay for!

In full disclosure, I have received this product for a discounted rate in exchange for my honest opinion. With this in mind, I have no relation to the seller, and make sure that everything in my review is my honest opinion that has been in no way influenced by any outside sources. If you found this review helpful, please let me know by clicking yes below.
summary: Not as Magical as I Hoped

reviewText: This wand is very nice. Has a nice shape to it and the finish is very shiny , almost too shiny but I think I can buff that out with a little bit of use. Took a while to receive this as it came from China directly but once here I quickly put it out for display after a few quick spells. The box it comes in is suitable for display as well and comes with a cool little magnetic latch on the flap so that it always closes when folded over. I loved this character in the series and never really noticed her wand because it didn't get much use in the films but it was there. The wand does have a little imperfections but only in places where it's not really noticeable like the end that's in the palm of your hand. This wand is not made of wood it's a resin cast replica so it's actually a little flexible if you try to bend it. You can also smell it! It's like a urethane or something. But for the price and saving yourself a trip to universal to get the really fancy one this one works great. As a disclaimer I was given a discount by the seller for the purpose or reviewing this item. Thanks!

I got this wand for my wife because Neville is her favorite character.  Honestly, neither of us really knew what his wand looked like, but a little research told us that this is his first wand.  For those of you who haven't read the books, Neville's first wand is broken in book five.  Though if you don't know that, you're probably not interested in replica Harry Potter wands ;).  Nevertheless, I trusted that anyone who makes and sells replica HP wands will know exactly what each character's wands (from the movies at least) look like.
The case is nice, it's solid with an odd array of artwork from The Deathly Hallows.  I would have preferred something less about advertising and more styled in a way that evokes "wizarding community," as it would make it more displayable.  Then again I ordered a wand replica, not a box replica.
The wand is great.  It looks just like the photos.  It's great quality too: solid with some weight behind it.  If you wanted, you can use it as a prop (our friends have had our fair share of Potter parties), just display it (it will definitely keep if you don't use it a lot), or out right play with it (but it probably won't last forever in that option).  At the end of the day, it's a great collectors item, because let's face it, there's no real practical use for a replica wand other than to share in the magic of HP.  And if you don't care about that, why are you looking at replica Harry Potter wands?
I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

reviewText: I bought this and another Harry Potter wand for my friend who loves the book and movies.  I was quite impressed by the box it came in, it shows movie scenes on the outside and has a magnetic clasp to keep the box shut.  The inside had a nice foam pillow for the wand and the wand itself was covered in bubble wrap.  The wand actually has some weight to it and seems pretty well made and durable.  I am not sure how well it replicates the actual wand, but it is pretty neat looking and fun to play around with.  My friend said that it would go excellent with her collection.  I don't think these are the actual WB replications, but they are pretty nice just the same for being made in China.  I think these are well worth the money, my friend loved them.  And for those who for some reason would wonder, no they do not create real magic.  I bet someone would ask.

I actually bought this as a gift for my husband, as we are both huge Harry Potter fans. It arrived today and the detail and quality are both outstanding. It was also a very reasonable price for such quality. Professor Slughorn isn't as easy to find as some of the more prominent characters, so this was great. The only thing that I can come close to saying negatively is that if you are looking for one that comes in an Ollivander's wand box, this would not be it; however, that being said, it does come in a very nice quality wand box with a scene from Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows. It will still make for a great addition to any Harry Potter collection. I am so glad that I ordered it and I plan on ordering many more before Christmas, as we are a big Harry Potter family.
I received this product free or at a reduced price in return for my honest and unbiased review. This in no way impacts the review I left, it is based solely on my opinion and experience with the product.

If you're Harry Potter fan is looking for a lighweight wand to add to their Harry Potter collection, this is a great choice. When I first saw the Viktor Krum wand, I was not that impressed. It looked pretty boring. Admittedly I was looking at an online picture and not at the reproduction in the Ollivander shop at Universal. I ordered one anyway because my son loves HP wands and Viktor is one of his favorite characters. I was very pleasantly surprised when I received the wand that it is actually a lot prettier than one would think from the online picture. The difference is in the detail of the handle.

Comparing the Vanko wand to what is shown in the HP film, I think they nailed it. In the film, the wand appears with a light color, is curved at the handle and the tip, and does not have a separate handle. At the end of the handle is a roughly carved face that resembles a bird. The color of the wand I received is very close to what is shown in the movie. There is quite a bit of detail to make it look like a roughly carved bird on the handle. It is a well-done replica. My son is thrilled with this wand. I also like the fact that the wand is a little thicker than most and should hopefully be a little harder to break.

I have other HP wands by Vanko and I am happy with the quality of the wands. The manufacturer is very responsive to any questions and stands behind their products.

Shipping does not take as long as is stated on the website. I received mine within 10 business days of ordering.
Beautiful, love it

I have 2 other wands from his same series and totally adore them. This one unfortunately snapped within the first day of having it. My guess is that it's a design flaw because it snapped with a clean break. It arrived in a beautiful cloth lined box. The material it is made out of resembles wood so much that's it's completely convincing. If this is to only be displayed and not actually used then it would be a great purchase. If you're looking to buy a wand from the Harry Potter series and it will be played with I advise you to choose another type. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.
summary: Beautiful wand that unfortunately snapped within the first day

reviewText:
This camellias woman camisole with built in bra torsolette bustier top slimming shape-wear, is just awesome and amazing! It makes you look slim, and it gives a little lift, in the upper area. The built in bra is padded, and you cannot take padding out, which is one thing i do not like about this, i do not care for padding in any type of bra or camisole. The built in bra might be good for not busty woman, i am not that busty, i wear a size C cup but i still prefer to wear a bra with this, it does not give a lot of support. The straps are detachable, which is awesome if you want to wear this with a strapless dress. It does have a zipper and clasp in the back, maybe to make it easy to take of? I think it is just super easy to slip over like a normal shirt, but when taking it off i do find the zipper and clasp in the back helpful so i can take this off without taking off my other shirt. It does slim me down a little bit, and just makes me feel good while wearing it!
  the one complaint i have about this is the smell, i don't know what it is but it is such a strong smell, i washed it like in the directions said to do, hand wash and hang dry, and the smell still didn't come all the way out. Hopefully next wash the smell will be gone, because it is very unpleasant. Overall i do like this camisole a lot, and wear it all the time under my clothes to slim me down a little bit, it is also a nice undershirt for like button ups.

reviewText: This is a first, a dress that fits the AVERAGE sized woman! So I actually ordered a size large expecting it to fit a bit snug, because they usually do when you order online like this, but this one was surprisingly a bit larger than I had expected. Which is ok because I have plenty of belts that help make it more form flattering! I included pics so you could see what I mean. I'm very tall (5'11") so this dress is a little short for my liking but I thought it wouldn't look too bad with boots on to match the belt! The fabric is very comfortable, it doesn't stick to my body at all, it hangs & flows nicely. The stitching on the inside was a little different, more bulgy than I'm used to but not anything that disrupted the look or feel of the dress. It's got an empire type waisted seem so that's where I chose to put my belt & I am a larger busted woman (36DD) so usually empire waist tops don't work for me but this dress worked out perfect, as if it was made for any size woman. The top is stretchy which is why it probably worked so well for my figure. I also always have issues with sleeve lengths never being long enough but these sleeves were the perfect length. I can tell this was made with a lot of thought & care, which I truly appreciate! I received this dress at a discount in return for my honest review, I would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a nice form flattering dress, it's the perfect one for any body type!
summary: Well made dress, form flattering for any body type!

I have reviewed another set of wooden watches which is very similar to this watch.
Not only did these watches appeal to me visually, but when I read that it was perfect for people with allergies, I knew that we had to have it! Multiple people in my family have allergies and sensitivities to metals preventing us from wearing your typical wrist watch. These watches are made of wood for the most part and is not only great for those of us with allergies, but it looks absolutely fabulous!

This watch arrived nicely packaged in a box that would be perfect for gifting as well as the watch is wrapped around a small jewelry pillow for not only looking nice,HOWEVER; why on earth would you take it like a moving box? You won't be able to remove the tape and if you try then the packaging will get ruined. That's my only complaint so far.

 I received my watches quickly and it was everything I had hoped for and more!

This watch is very lightweight, but sturdy at the same time. I can see this watching lasting us for years to come, it is that well made. The wood is very high quality and just looks super stunning. The contrast of color gives it a very eye popping look that has gotten several compliments so far! This watch is easy to use and easy on the eyes...I highly recommend it for those looking for a beautiful watch that is perfect for those of us with allergies.
I received this product at no cost to me and have provided my honest opinion in return.
summary: but when I read that it was perfect for people with allergies

This is a super cute, but ridiculously small sweatshirt. First off I should say it is well made, except for one little string sticking out of the shoulder. Also it's a really nice material. I love the pattern they have going on, but if you're over 100 pounds this probably won't fit. I wouldn't consider myself a fat person, but this made me feel obese. When it comes to sweatshirts I usually get a medium, because I like a nice baggy feel. So with this I got the US 10. Which is the 2XL in their world. I swear the women over there must be super SUPER tiny, because if this is a 2XL I can't even fathom what their Small would look like.
Anyway because their sizes are always a little off I figured go big. Worst case scenario it'll be too big, which isn't really even possible when it comes to sweatshirts. So, like I was saying I assumed this would be baggy on me. Well I couldn't even get my arms in it. Without putting my arms in the sleeves I could slide it past my shoulders, but it only went to about two inches below my boobs. So there is no way this will fit me. It could definitely pass as childrens clothing. Which sucks because it's really cute. Too bad it's so small. For comparison I put a photo of this sweatshirt laying on top of a medium sweatshirt. As you can see it is much smaller. So size ten my butt.

I was a 36B before getting pregnant and a 36C at the end of my pregnancy, I don't know what goes on with my boobs now, they're probably a D when they're full, I don't wear a bra most days, but I ordered an XXL and they fit great. They came with an extender for the back clasps if necessary but I didn't need them. The straps are broad and comfortable, there's no underwire but they're very supportive.

Definitely give them a try for the price, I am very pleased!

I was absolutely blown away when I got this top. My pictures don't do it justice. The draping over-layer and the long sleeved inner layer come together to make the perfect layered top. The sleeves and inner layer actually feel like modal. The top layer is a translucent chiffon-like fabric that comes together in the top exactly like the photo. The sleeves are actually long enough for my 5'9" tall frame, it's always a struggle with long-sleeved shirts! I could see this top being in the price range of $60-100 depending on the designer, it reminds me of a Max Studio, Tahari or similar. For the $25-ish price I was absolutely blown away and I will be taking a close look at more products from this designer. This top goes very well with leggings or skinny jeans. The inner layer is long enough to drape almost mid thigh in the front and the back drapes down past my knees but flutters open like wings. It doesn't happen very often that I like mail-order clothing this much. I wore this out to a birthday dinner tonight and it was so comfortable. I can't wait to wear it again.

I was looking for a feather headband for my 2 1/2 month old to go with a dress whose color is not quite white (maybe a pearl or ivory). When I first pulled this headband out of the box, it looked more like a dirty white. It has some ugly netting, which I immediately cut off (I could see from the pics before I ordered it that it had netting, so this was expected). I then held it next to the dress. Seeing it next to the dress, it looked much better. I was satisfied with the color at this point.

Other things I expected based on other buyers' feedback: the headband is too big for a young baby, so I adjusted and stitched it to fit. The feathers were also flat, so I used heavy books to try and get a little more of a curve. They never curved as much as I wanted, but better than flat.

Overall I am very happy with this headband and my baby received many compliments. It's a little outrageous, but in a cute way that only a baby can get away with :-)

reviewText: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this shirt!  I literally just received it & tried it on immediately. I ordered a large as I usually like roomier tops. I am fairly large breasted at a 36C/D. The next layers of this top flow to the side & these layers are very silky soft too. The front drapes nicely & I love the back of the top as it is divided/split which adds to the style of this top. I haven't worn out yet but sure to get compliments. Obviously cannot tell you how it washes yet either. I did already log on & ordered another one in a different color. All size Large were sold out in the other 2 colors so I ordered a Medium. I know a medium will fit too as I had said, the innermost too is stretchy. The medium may actually fit me better.  I am a big fashion bug & I like things that are different & unique. reviewText: good quality and nice

I manage a pediatric practice and I wear cardigans nearly every day in the office. We always have the air running, and my skin tends to get very chilled. I have a blanket in my office to help keep my legs warm while wearing a skirt, and I usually wear a cardigan with a scarf of some type. When I saw this cardigan, I thought that I could never have too many black cardigans, so I wanted another. This was priced okay and it looked like a good product. I placed the order and this was shipped to me really quickly. This came sealed in plastic wrapping. I tried this on, and it fits me well. I thought that this may run a bit small, so I ordered this in an extra large. I am a medium size in t-shirts, but I like the way that cardigans fit when they are a bit larger and longer on me, especially the longer sleeves. I would say that this extra large is really more of a large. It still fits me okay and I am keeping it. The sleeves are a good length and rest just beneath my wrists. I washed this, and it did not fade or lose any form. The stitching is good on this, and I did not note any loose threads. This does help to keep me warm. The lightweight material makes this easy to throw on and dress up or down with a skirt or jeans. I am happy with this product and I would recommend it. I received this product (very kindly) at a discounted rate during a special promotion. I treat each product that I review as though I paid full price for it. My review is not influenced or manipulated in anyway, and I hope that you find my review helpful for you. Please vote that my review was helpful if it was, and feel free to send me any questions related to this product; I will try my best to answer them for you. My review, thoughts, and opinion are unbiased and 100% that of my own.
summary: Lightweight and Easy to Dress Up or Down

reviewText:
Based on my experience, the sizes are accurate to what is advertised.  I have it placed on my dress form since she is better endowed than I.  Her sizing is set based on the advertised size of an  XXL.

My arms tend to run a slightly larger sized, but they still fit into this cardigan.  The fabric is very similar to an opaque pair of tights, and they kind of looked like it on my arms.

Due to the close-fitted arms, I got a little warmer in this a little more quickly than normal.  This will not stop me from adding it to my regular wardrobe rotation.  The main body still drapes nicely and it doesn't feel like I'm about to hulk out of the seams.  This would be great for places that always feel cold without having to carry a bulky jacket or sweater, and it can be folded small enough to fit into a purse if you no longer need it and don't want to carry it or go all the way back to the car.

I picked the beige, and kind of wish I would have picked something more colorful, but it still works and even matches a pair of my shoes.  If you like a baggier fit, I would recommend picking a size bigger than what you normally wear.

One drawback is that the fabric does act like tights, so be cautious when laundering.  Doing it improperly can result in pilling, tears, and snags.  This is not a manufacturing issue, but the nature of the fabric so be aware.

I received a discount on this product so that I would provide a fair and unbiased review.
summary: It's like leggings for your arms.

reviewText:
I purchased this watch and the matching mens watch for my mother and father in law for Mothers and Fathers days, respectively.  They really liked them and the watches are much better in person as the pictures don't show you how the light hits them and highlights the wood.  I had to knock a star off of the women's watch, however, as it was way too small for my mother in law.  The mens watch was way too big for my father in law so they switched watches.  Whatever works for them, but that does tell me that it is important on these watches to measure your wrist to make sure it will fit.  Links are removable but no extra links are included.  Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase.  The watch runs well, has a quiet tick and looks incredibly expensive.  The boyfriend watch look is in right now so if you are a lady don't stress about the size of the womens watch if you have big wrists.  Go for the mens.  If you are a man and have little wrists, go for the ladies.  They are both nice.

All opinions are truly my own and it is my pleasure to be able to offer others my thoughts so they might be able to make informed decisions as to whether products are appropriate for them. I am not a paid reviewer and I am in no way required by the seller to leave positive remarks about their product. I gain nothing by giving this item a positve, negative or neutral review. If at any time in the future with prolonged use of any product my opinion changes, I will leave an update to my review of the product (as you can see by past reviews, that happens).
summary: Very nice but make sure you measure your wrist first

reviewText:
This Women's Zebra Wood Steel Ring Case Watch from Ideashop is uniquely stunning.  I fell in love with it the moment I saw it and it is even more beautiful in person.  The watch sits on a watch pillow inside a gift box for a nice gift presentation.

The watch is handmade from beautifully crafted solid Zebrawood giving it a unique striped appearance.  The color and wood grain vary due to it being made from the real deal and is what really gives this watch its beauty.  I get so many compliments on this and it really draws people in with curiosity.  I am always getting asked if my watch is made of wood.

The face of the watch has a steel ring around the outer dial with a clear plastic casing.  It has black and silver design for the minute/hour indications.  The date is displayed on the face of the watch.  The minute and hour hands both glow in the dark for easy reference.  There is a stainless steel turn dial on the left of the watch to set the time and date.  The overall design of the face on this watch is stunning and the different wood color variations make this one of its kind.

The watch is waterproof up to 30m however I don't use it in or around water.  The skins natural oil will make this watch luster over time and even more beautiful.  It can be made smaller to fit even the smallest of wrists allowing up to three links removed on each side.  It opens and closes using a stainless steel push button clasp that makes it easy to put on and off on your own.

This watch has a matching men's watch you can purchase separately to make a couples set.  This makes a great gift idea, I would of loved to have received this from my husband unexpectedly.  The wooden watch is on trendy right now and is very stylish both on and off the wrist.

Overall both the quality and look of this watch exceeded any and all my expectations.  I highly recommend this to others.  I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest unbiased review.  All opinions are 100% my own.  If you have any questions please feel free to comment under my review and I will do my best to answer them for you
summary: Stunning Women's Watch, Handmade From Solid Zebrawood, Date On Face, Glow In The Dark Hands, Adjustable Band

reviewText: I seldom give jewelry or adornments to my wife as gifts but I suspected she might like this watch. She absolutely loves it !!! She was concerned about it being large on the wrist but our jeweler was able to adjust the band without any problems. she has received many compliments on the watch and also it's uniqueness. The only caveat that I would give a buyer is if your significant other has some wooden objects, knick knacks, etc in your home then try to match up the wooden color to those objects. I love the color and patterns of zebra wood and it also matches my wife's things and my favorite acoustic electric guitar.
summary: Gets lots of compliments. Is unique and doesn't break the bank.

I don't know what it is, but absolutely everyone around me has been wearing these "CC" tagged hats. I went to a gift shop inside a musuem and found them priced at $24.99. $24.99? When they're this much on amazon? Highway robbery! But, people buy them, and that's why they stock them. After receiving these, both mom-in-law and aunt-in-law want Maroon and Teal slouch-hats. The slouch isn't overly pronouned (rastafari style), which is perfect. It does fit a bun without stretching out awkwardly, and that's why I got them!

Excellent fit and price! 5/5

There is more color variety available here than any other outlet I've encountered, so I have already ordered more (pumpkin, maroon, silver, black). The mustard-color within this set is excellent -- too often Mustard = violent yellow, and not the calm autumnal tone one hopes for! The cinch of the hat is great, and even with some exaggerated movement, the hat doesn't slip off! Nor is it constricting!

If I could make a change, it would be to add additional textures, but keep the clunky knit! Not a reason to give it any less than 5/5, just hoping for future developments that expand on these great hats! Breathable and warm, preventing your hair from becoming a mess of sweat, just to keep warm in the wind! I do find the hats can stretch out a bit if someone with huge hair puts them on, but that's to be expected of most any fiber that you would put on your head!
summary: I see these hats all over town now...and I paid less.

Let me start by saying that I absolutely love this jacket. It fits a little loose, but in a good way, it looks great, matches almost everything, and is able to be dressed up or down depending on what you wear with it.

This is not a cold weather jacket. It is a very light weight jacket that is perfect for layering over your warm weather clothes in maybe spring or summer when the mornings are still cold but you don't want to be stuck wearing long sleeves all day. If you are thinking it can keep you warm in cold weather, you'll be disappointed. It could be great for wearing in an overly air conditioned building during summer.

It's also super comfortable. The material is not overly stiff like denim jackets sometimes are. The sleeves are a nice soft cotton type material. It's very breathable. I am probably going to wear this as much as possible. Love it.
summary: Let me start by saying that I absolutely love this jacket

reviewText: Great product!
It's made to look like denim but it's this cotton/spandex material. It wasn't what I wanted to I gave it to my mom. Save your money and get one from Target. Oh yeah, the pockets are fake. No pockets.

I took the advice of some commenters here and ordered a size up, medium, because I dislike tight-fitting jackets. I will keep the medium, but a small would have been a better fit. The medium is what I would have expected from a medium, not undersized at all. I have not washed it yet. Hopefully it will shrink a bit.

The quality of the fabric and construction are much better than I anticipated for the price and the jacket is cute and comfortable.
summary: Do not size up, but this is not a plus-sized jacket.

It comes with the batteries, you just have to take the cardboard piece out first. It has 4 different settings for the lights and then you can push it off. reviewText: The Oliadesign LED Luminous Mix Color Necktie is super adorable. I know it says it for kids but before I give it to kids us adults are going to have some fun. This is a super perfect prop for our fun Photo Booth we are doing at our holiday Christmas party. This tie is really super cute it is red and has sequins on it. There is an LED light that runs the length of the tie and shines through the material. The light has three settings: a super-fast blink, medium speed and slow speed. The necktie does not have to be tied it has an elastic strip that is connected to it so you just slip it on over your head. This is a super fun tie for kids and adults. The watch that I received bears only some resemblance to what is pictured in the ad. All of the basics are there, but the brushed, stainless finish on the case is far more coarse, there are little dings in the finish, especially where the case meets the crystal.  The sharp, clearly visible roman numerals in the picture are, instead, barely contrasting with a DARK bezel, so that they are hardly visible/legible at all. There is a 3x4mm area of abrasion on the bezel /crystal between 9 and 10. There are numerous, terrible scratches on the back of the watch, and the plating is either worn off or simply absent on part of the back, leaving patches of exposed brass showing through. OK. For $37, I didn't expect a Rolex or even a Timex, but I do expect a running, and undamaged watch, and though it does appear to run, it falls miserably short in the second category, and one out of two just doesn't cut it here. Basically, this thing looks like a cheap, not so well used watch on which someone stuck a new band, so they could sell it after it had been returned. I will try to post some pics of my own here in the future to illustrate my point.
I will be contacting the vendor and returning this for a refund.
summary: If mine is any example, don't waste your money.

I wanted a simple, soft black scarf to wear in air conditioned places and this fits the bill.

The product listing says that this scarf/wrap/shawl is cashmere, but then the description says fleece, so I don't know exactly what it's made of, but I can tell you that's it's beautiful and luxuriously soft.  I was offered a sample by the manufacturer so I could evaluate the product, so I chose it in the Ochre color. Ochre is similar to camel color, so this scarf will work well with any outfit and it makes a very nice fashion accessory.

Measuring 79" x 24", the scarf is wide enough to use as a wrap, a shawl, or a head covering, and also long enough to wrap around the neck, or to wear open draped around the neck, and the short fringes on the ends add a nice feminine touch.  The scarf came nicely presented in a store bag, and I detected no odor upon removing it from its packaging. I love this scarf. It's very attractive, well made, warm, and very, very soft.

This scarf was provided at no cost by the manufacturer for evaluation and review.

Gorgeous color, super soft.  The description says it is wool cashmere.  I can't tell which percentage is wool and which is cashmere but it feels very, very soft.  It is also thick enough to keep you warm without being too heavy or at all rough.  It's the perfect shawl for over a formal dress to keep you warm at night.  It can also be worn with anything really.  It is exactly like the Pashminas that were so popular a few years back.

The most amazing thing is the color.  The blue is such a deep, vibrant blue, it attracts your eyes and it's hard to look away.  It's very pretty.  It is also very flattering with most colors.

Even though I received a sample for an unbiased review, I also think the price is amazing.  $10 for the color and quality is absolutely worth it.  I really like this shawl and highly recommend it.

I got this scarf in blue. The color is beautiful deep royal blue and looks amazing with almost every color of clothing worn. The material of the scarf is also very soft and comfortable to touch and feel against the skin. Some wools cause me skin allergies and irritation, but, this only made me feel comfortable. No irritation! I do agree with Ali Julia that it sheds some fibers when washed and loses color, and it definitely feels like thin fleece. The scarf is wide enough to cover your head and wrap it around. Its about 6.5 feet long and 2 feet wide as well. It can be machine washed and does not require a lot of maintenance and care in handling. The scarf is available in various color. Ships fast and packaged well!

Sample provided without any obligations.

Well.. Hmm.. Cute sunglasses.  They just arrived.  I think they fell off the boat from China, though.  The entire package was soaked through and smelled like rotting fish.  They came with what I'm sure would have been a lovely pleather case which was in something that resembled a box of some sort.  It was difficult to determine through the reek and sogginess of the whole thing. I unwrapped it & tossed it all into the garbage outside by my mailbox.  You know that wet pleather with dead fish smell?  Sexy.  I suspect the neighborhood cats will be trolling the garbage soon.
The glasses were fine, although admittedly stinky.  I washed them off with some dish soap and hot water - once the smell was gone, they are pretty cute sunglasses!  Mine actually do look like the picture.  They're very lightly-tinted shades - so not meant for super sunny days.  I loved that one woman's recommendation of wearing with a big floppy hat!  They make me think of the regular specs Jane Fonda wore in 9 to 5.
So, all in all, not a horrific experience or anything - just a stinky one.

i knew the minute i put it on that it was categorically not 100% cashmere, since it itched.  i went looking for labels.  there are no sewn in labels, which is always worrisome.  it had 2 tags dangling off it.  both were predominantly chinese characters, paired unhelpfully with a smattering of english.  example on one tag's side "company profile" followed by characters only.  nonetheless, i believe i found persuasive evidence that it was known to not be 100% cashmere simply by making assumption that one place it had the grouping of percents associated with characters-only of 70%/20%/10% would be materials.  incidentally, my checking "too small" on fit question, is not a complaint since i know that "asian" labeled clothes mean i, a medium, will need to order at least XXL usually.  it's definitely shorter than in the picture.  the dress is beautiful & not see-through. i will either return it or check if any of my nieces don't have wool-itch response & pass it along.  i have a beside-the-point thing to say which i will not elaborate on - the packaging is unusual, functional & beautiful.

So I obtained this shirt from Zbrandy last week.  Much like the reviews said, it was smaller than expected.  I am 6'5" with a large build.  I ordered two sizes bigger than I would normally for other amazon shirts, and although that made the sleeves adequate length the arms were tight and body length such that it could only be worn "un-tucked".  I was disjointed a bit as the shirt is VERY NICE linen and super comfortable, but my disappointment turned to complete satisfaction with their customer service contacting me within 24 hrs and assuring me that they would make this right in any way I felt fair.  This kind of customer service is so rare it humbled me.  In any case, if you are tall, bulky in the arms and chest, or husky I would suggest the XXXL.  These shirts are a great value compared to comparable quality I have bought from retailers and other suppliers on Amazon

Shipping was slow, but, for the price, this watch is actually pretty nice. (There was ANOTHER watch that I ordered from the same vendor and it was pretty unfortunate) This watch is as glitzy in person as it is in the ad pics,  and is easy to read. There appears to be no damage or wear on the more visible areas. There are some light scratches on the back, but they aren't bad, the plating is intact, and I suspect that they are just the result of some less-than-careful handling at the factory or warehouse. When worn, no one will see them and they aren't deep enough to create abrasion to the skin. The watch does NOT have any box, just a little plastic seam-lock type bag, and that's also likely why it's picked up those scratches.
There are some minor issues-
When setting the watch, I noticed that the minute hand does not completely clear all of the hour markers. They aren't high enough to stop it, but there is a little noticeable hang-up as it passes over them when manually moving the hand to set it. Also, (and at first this really concerned me) while in the setting mode, with the stem pulled out, it was actually possible to cause the minute hand to move by itself, about +/- 4-5 minutes, just by tilting the watch, even with the stem securely held in place. FORTUNATELY, after setting (and not tilting the watch) re-pressing to stem to start the movement must re-engage the movement's control of the hand sufficiently so that that loose movement is no-longer elicitable, and does not manifest after the watch is back to running. The strap was basic but not bad.
As to accuracy- I set the watch to 1/2sec slow and rechecked it after >24hrs, and it was still about 12-3/4 sec slow- Acceptable, but note that this was with the watch still in box, not worn. So I don't yet know if that will effect it.
Overall, I'd say, for the money, if you're looking for an inexpensive watch for a younger person or that Eeyore fan in your life, ( who already has a bunch of expensive watches to fall back on, but might want something to wear at work for a lark ) then this might be a good, low-buck gamble, fun buy for a stocking stuffer, which is why I gave it 4-stars.

This is a really nice watch. I was on the fence about getting it but I'm glad I did. It's looks great. It's not a chronograph but I would rather have this setup and get an automatic than get a chrono with a quartz movement. You can manual wind this piece or you can just simply wear it and it will quickly charge. The band is ok, I really didn't like it so I took it off and put it on a stainless steel bracelet which made the watch look even better. For the price, this is a must buy. Extra's..... the bezel is unidirectional and the second and third button screw down. Watch is size is 40mm and the band size is 20mm.

Watch info says leather band. Product info says synthetic leather. With this in mind I wonder if the gold is plated or layered? Is it plated directly on stainless or does it have some flaky copper stuff upon which the gold is plated thereby turning my wrist green?
At first I trusted Amazon. But may the buyer beware. Also be prepared to wait a month while the Chinese make your watch (info says German technology. Which is deceptive even if the Chinese use German machines.) I could go on but the 2 rules below sum it up. To which I add if YOU know your products don't expect your secretary who doesn't to type it up and get it right.
summary: 1)KNOW YOUR PRODUCTS! 2)Give your customer true complete information.

reviewText: nice necklace

This is such a great wallet! I got this because I needed a wallet that would fit a passport. My passport is actually not a real one, it's from a local restaurant where you can purchase their passport and get stamps for visiting their locations. I don't know if the size is the exact same as a normal passport, because it didn't fit in the front right mesh pocket, but it did fit in the space behind that pocket so it still works for me.

I got the pink color with just the word "passport" on the front. It's very pretty and I love the bright color. It's not neon bright, just a happy bright pink.

The card slots are great because they don't go too far down. I had a wallet once where the slots went too far down and my cards would get stuck, but this wallet doesn't have that problem. I fit a lot of cards in the card slots. There is also a large space to put paper money. The only thing this is missing is a zippered coin pocket. I usually don't have coins anyway but it would be nice to have.

After I put all my junk in the wallet, it doesn't stay closed, but I just throw it in the middle section of my purse so I don't really care. It doesn't have any kind of closure so if that's a problem for you, don't get this.

I really like this wallet and use it as my everyday wallet.  It's pretty and has the space I need for all my cards and such.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I hope I helped you make a decision about this product!
summary: Lots of space for all my cards and my passport.

reviewText:
I ordered this Leatherly Genuine Leather Passport Case and Wallet with Billfold in pink to easily identify that it was my passport while traveling.  I ordered one of a different brand for my husband in blue.  Things can get a bit hectic as you travel through lines at the airport, it's nice to be able to easily access and identify your passport and ID.  This wallet is nice as there is room for other small travel documents, credit cards and identification.  The leather is soft and sturdy; this is a nice Passport case.

Even though it is not real leather the material looks well made and durable. I am very satisfied with this wallet.

I received this product in exchange for an unbiased review. I am not obligated to write a positive or a negative review. If a product is poor, I will state so without any hesitation. All of my opinions are my own. If you found this review useful, please click 'Yes' below.

I am a frequent international traveller and looking for leather  cover for my passport. This leather cover is  made up of very fine leather and stitched really well.
You can keep up to 6 credit cards which is good enough for me including my international CC's. In addition to that it holds place to keep your photo identity other than passport like International Driver licence/permit etc..
It has lot of space to carry your passport some cash and it works pretty much like a large size wallet. It fits my back jeans pocket, coat, jacket and easy to carry.
Quality of this product is much better than what i have seen in many major shopping stores.
The only thing which i could have been improved is the small piece of net cloth used for license pocket which is ok for now. I am hoping for this product to last long.

I received this product on discount price for my honest and biased review.

I purchased this passport cover for an upcoming trip so I haven't technically used it yet. However, upon receiving it, I did put my passport in the netted section of the wallet. Unfortunately, and the only reason I left off the 5th star, the netting is very tight and not quite wide enough to hold an actual passport. I really had to shove it in there to get it to fit. But, there are other places in the wallet for the passport so at least it will fit somewhere. Other than that, this wallet is pretty nice. Real leather, lightweight, nice looking, and lots of card slots and space for money. I'll definitely be able to use it for travel purposes.

Nowadays, we should no longer very much at ease when it comes to keeping our valuables or essential safely.  Sometimes, we tend to trust too much that we don't get to think about the possibility of these stuff to be taken or stolen from us.  As a frequent traveler like I am, it is very important that my credit cards, other important identification cards, passport, and cash will be secure and will not be vulnerable to any pick-pocketing or stealing (I hate to think that this seldom happens out there), and that they are all together in one place. It is easy when all the things you need for travel will be in one wallet as you will have an easy access of having them when you need them.  This particular leather passport wallet is made from high quality material.  It displays durability, thus I think this will serve me for a long time, which is really nice.  It has enough slots to accommodate your different cards.  It also has separate compartments for your passport, cash, and your plane tickets or boarding pass.  I am also glad that the compartments or slots are not too tight nor too loose, so you will have an easy time putting in and getting out your cards.  This really organizes your valuable items.

It is too bulky to fit snug to the head and not bulky enough to fold down a bit like some hats (as in the photo). The price is a little steep for what you get. $60-$75 would have been much better because of the materials and simplicity of the item . The paint is ok. A few small cracks in a few places where the rim meets the dome. The PVC plastic is thick and tough, but easily misshapen in spots. The rim that goes around is a bit warped/bent especially in the back. It's not as straight and flat as the image. I'm sure that varies from order to order, so be aware.

The wings are thick and look nice, but can easily be broken during installation. You have to be somewhat forceful to stick it in the holes. One of mine snapped right in two. It glues together easy enough, but really? I'm not that strong. Each wing has a pair of holes it goes through. One on the top, and one under the rim. Gotta be careful with the lower holes as the plastic that makes them up is very thin on the inner side. They can break if you're not careful.

No chinstrap, but it sits on my head nicely. I'm 5'11" and i'd say my head is average size. Without a strap it's still pretty good, just don't make a lot of crazy head moves. I can always add a strap too easily enough.

If you need something quick like I did, then it's an ok choice.
summary: Does the job, but could be a little cheaper.

reviewText: It is kind of big

This helmet is AWESOME. Was a little concerned that it wouldn't live up to the price, but it is both collector item quality as well as cosplay quality, so I'm sure I'll get my money's worth out of its costume and display value. I may or may not have worn it around the house for hours after receiving it (totally did), and I am a grown man.

Just on the technical side, the PVC material of the helmet itself is somewhat flexible (but not enough that it flops around) and the wings, which are resin, almost feel like metal. They are very high quality and detailed, and they come detached from the helmet. The only somewhat tricky part is attaching them, as there are no instructions. You just push the tabs into the holes on the helmet, but you have to sort of force them through. Once in they stay with no issues!
It's very large (the fit) and I have a very large head!

The Wings were nice, despite one being broken. The actual helmet though was crudely painted with spots missing paint. The visor if you wish to call it that I don't know what the actual name is, folds over in a thick and unflattering way that is not visible from the pictures provided. In my opinion not worth the price, and the only positive I could give it were the wings that looked incredible but like I said were broken.

reviewText:
I absolutely love this dress, so much so I got married in it! I'm plus size and it was pretty frustrating trying to find a dress that wasn't huge, matronly looking, or had 20 different layers. I pretty much had given up trying to find an elegant dress that didn't overwhelm me. Thankfully two months before my wedding, I randomly looked on Amazon and saw this very pretty style dress. I loved the light lace overlay on the bodice, the color of the champagne tulle, the cute buttons, and the open arm cut. Since the dress was so inexpensive, I thought "what do I have to lose?" and ordered one in my size.

The next day after placing my order I received an email from the maker saying they had a surprise and asked what my measurements were!! It turns out they made my dress to size. I had no idea they offered tailoring! So I sent them my measurements and (I had seen the shipping might take up to two months since it is shipping from China) asked if there was any way I could pay extra for expedited shipping to make sure the dress arrived on time. I received an email back within 12 hours saying no extra charge was needed and that they would work hard to make sure my dress shipped out as quickly as possible. The seller went above and beyond and I'm so grateful to them!

I received the dress after 3 weeks and it was packaged with a lot of love. They turned the dress inside out and wrapped it in such a way that no damage could have happened to it (there were a couple of wrinkles on the satin lining, but they easily came out with a little steaming. I was so excited unwrapping the dress and feeling the great quality of the fabric. I tried the dress on and it fit like a dream! It was so light weight and even prettier than the product picture. The lining of the dress and bodice is a double sided satin, there are two layers of tulle on the champagne dress (bottom layer white tulle, top layer a lovely beige), the lace overlay was sturdy yet delicate in appearance and trimmed nicely, and then the custom fit just really made the whole thing so special.

I'm so happy with this dress and received a million compliments when I wore it. Seriously it couldn't have been any better. I 100% recommend buying this dress and working with this incredible seller!
summary: So beautiful and made to size!!

reviewText:
It arrived quickly, but when I picked up the box I automatically thought it felt too light. Uh oh. Does this mean it's made out of crappy material? Read on.

The body of the dress is completely straight and not flowy at all, making it difficult to walk. It's covered by two layers of cheap tulle that would not uncrinkle. This is the type of material my kids use in arts and crafts to make bug nets.

The top of the dress is strapless with lace over tulle and very itchy. The distance from my shoulders to where my boobs go is too far apart. Now, I know I've nursed 4 kids and my tits are headed south, but not THAT far south. Not to mention, its "padded". I mean, these"pads" were made for a girl with a B cup, at most. Not a double D like myself. It literally looks like I've got huge, hard nipples all the time...

The arm holes are also too big and gap open. I could alter the dress but I'd have to widen the skirt so it flows, replace the tulle with better lace, take up the shoulders ( which would be tricky seeing how it's got a lace pattern I'd  probably end up ruining), and then, well, it probably would be easier to just get a whole new dress.

The color was pretty, I'll give them that.

So I guess if you have a cookie cutter size 5 body, you'll do alright with this. But anyone who's got a few extra pounds and is picky about what they want, I suggest spend a few more dollars and buy something else.

reviewText: My granddaughter loved the color and the velvet top & sleeves
My granddaughter still loves this, though she had to unsnap the bottom so she would be more comfortable. May this is her grandma's fault and not that of the piece of clothing.

My daughters' dance teacher asked me to help her order costumes for their entire class for an upcoming dance recital.

As it is "dance recital season" and the teacher asked me at the last minute, dance costumes and sizes were flying off the shelves everywhere.

When I found these leotards, I was so excited.  They were the so cute and at an great price point.  They had just enough in each size I needed... which was really hard to believe.

Half my order was  shipped via Amazon Prime and half the shipped out immediately through other services.  However,  the next day, I saw that although the leotards had already shipped out, they may or may not arrive on time.  The vendor was AMAZING and immediately issued me a refund even though the order had shipped.

I ended up ordering up one size for leotards that could be shipped via Amazon Prime.

Also, we have had mail/package theft recently in our neighborhood, so this vendor was really nice as to address this issue with me as well.

Yesterday, the first half of my order arrived and the leotards were surprisingly EXTREMELY well made.  The material is good quality and the stiching is strong.  It also has snaps in the crotch which is a HUGE plus.  Girls who need to use the restroom right before they go on stage, have a quick way to go potty without ruining any hair, make up, accessories, etc.

I cannot recommend this product and this vendor enough!  Fantastic!!!!
summary: Excellent Product and Even Better Customer Service

reviewText: This is a pretty little dress, nicely cut and true to size. I usually wear a size 10-12. The 14 also fits, but seems a little large around the neckline and is a bit more billowy around the body. The fabric seems to be a cotton/polyester blend from the way it feels, though it can pass for a linen-cotton blend to an observer (in other words, you won't feel as though you're wearing a polyester dress). Because of the double layered material, the dress is opaque. That'll be nice in summer: no slip required. I'm 5'6" and it falls to mid-calf on me in the front, with the sides tapering a few inches longer. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.

reviewText: Nice cool dress for the summer.

Good design! Most of the dress is 2 layers, so it can be worn without a slip. It can be worn around the house or out and about. The workmanship leaves a bit to be desired (I'm a sewer, so I recognize such things), but is not really visible from the outside. For the price (marvelous), this is expected, and the design compensates. The listing says it's "cotton/linen," but I can't confirm that (since it's a finished product, I didn't do the standard test). Though the fabric is nice, it doesn't look or feel much like cotton or linen and is rather drapey (which is appropriate for the design). But there are a lot of weaves, so I just don't know. The company is up front about the fabric content of other items, so perhaps this dress IS cotton. Delivery was excellent (it came all the way from China).

These tags and handle "wraps" for luggage made it very easy to identify my bag in a sea of similar black bags.  The handle grips are soft, stayed tight around the handle and I liked being able to order a specific color.  The tags are sturdy and just the right size.  My only negative is that the tags do not have any type of covering over the name/address. So, if your bag is anywhere it can get wet (in the rain) the writing could smear.  I took some clear, thin plastic and slid it inside the tag.  That was perfect and protected the information from moisture.  Very sturdy plastic tag - would definitely buy again.  These went through several overseas flights and stayed attached to luggage with no problems.
summary: Tags help to identify bags easily

As you can see in my pictures, there were several threads that needed to be trimmed when it arrived (none that were from damage or snags, just finish work). The buttons are cute, but much shinier than I expected. I like the length because I am 5'6", and HATE having my midsection exposed.  I weigh about 130 lbs and the medium fits just right. I machine washed this top on cold, in a net garment bag, and hung it to dry. I would expect it to shrink a lot if put in the dryer.

I own the designer version of this top as well. It does drape more nicely, but the overall fit is very similar.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

Firstly, I really love this Cold Shoulder Long Sleeve Bodycon Mini Dress. Here's why. It's actually a very versatile dress to add to your wardrobe collection. You can dress it up quite nicely with a high waisted belt and high heels, and it looks especially cute worn with a western belt and cowboy boots. And since this mini dress is a cotton blend, it makes for a simple, yet super cute and extremely comfy swimsuit cover-up! In the colder months, it would work really well with a pair of tights and knee high boots or high heeled booties. However you choose to wear it, one thing is for certain; it's incredibly comfortable and stylish. If you're concerned about sizing, I'm 5'9, 160lbs and a 38DD. I ordered the XL, but could've very well went with a large. It really does fit true to size. And I especially love the cold shoulder detail.
In full disclosure, this item was supplied to me at a discounted rate to test and evaluate it for their customers. I was not told what to write, nor was I asked to give it a certain rating. I always give my honest and unbiased opinion of each product. My words and the rating I provided are my own and are based on my own personal experience with this mini dress. Whether positive or negative, all of my reviews reflect my own opinions and may differ from others. And with that being said, I would still definitely recommend this dress.
summary: Excellent, versatile, extremely comfortable mini dress!

I ordered this tool to change out the tops of my sternum piercing. I have the staple-shaped barbell that pierces two places in my chest. Due to the already tight skin in that area and the length of the bar that faces outward, there is very little space with which to grab the bar. Based on the measurements of this tool, it should have easily anchored the exposed area of the bar. However, the measurements are off and the tips of the tool are larger than advertised. As such, I ended up pinching the skin while clamping and this caused an infection. Perhaps this tool works better for an actual dermal piercing. I would not recommend this for a sternum piercing that uses a barbell.

The 2 Fashion Silicone Balance Bracelets, Silicone Beaded-Harmony White/Camo Combo All Sizes (Medium) are a nice, budget friendly alternative to the well known overpriced name brand balance bracelets out there. I have seen the name brand balance bracelets in the local boutiques and while I like the meaning behind them, I just couldn't justify paying that much for a plastic bracelet. This set from Harmony Balance Bracelets is a great alternative, and the perfect solution for me! The bracelets are made from silicone and look exactly like the other brand, just without the logo imprinted on the black and white beads. I ordered the size medium, which is for the average sized woman, and it fits me perfectly. I plan to keep the clear bracelet for myself and give the camo one to my sister. I am very pleased with the quality and design of this product and highly recommend it! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These silicone "balance" bracelets are oddly attractive. I was actually pleasantly surprised to see that they don't look "cheap," and are rather pretty on your wrist. As a harmony tool, my understanding is use the white bracelet (color) as a kind of meditation tool when you need to stay calm, while the darker bracelet and beads helps you concentrate on working out your problems. Yes, it's a "mind" thing, but lots of people use tactile-type triggers to practice their meditative chants or thinking, so why not a couple of pretty bracelets? Size-wise, they are VERY true to size, so if you have a large wrist, be sure to order a large size. I received this product for free for my honest unbiased review.
summary: Silicone Bracelets Are Cute and Functional

reviewText: The sweater is not like normal sweater fabric, a little more synthetic feeling but I wouldn't say it's uncomfortable, it's actually nice and thick enough to keep me warm here in rainy Oregon. None of the print looks like it will wear off anytime soon and the pocket is spacious and warm and soft inside. My only complaint is the sizing. I assed it would run small being that the shipper is out of country so I ordered a 3X, and I'm normally a L-XL. It fits PERFECT but only because I ordered a lot bigger than I normally am. If you intend on buying this, please account for the very small sizing.  Disclaimer: I reviewed this at a discounted price for my honest review.
summary: Very comfortable, just runs very small.

reviewText:
Love everything about this hoodie. The color, the fabric, the printing, its a hoodie that will last.
My only problem is the Asian charting it goes by, 3XL is not 3XL in American sizing, it fits me more like a t shirt than a  loose hoodie that I was expecting.  With this, the 3XL fits more like a large or XL.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I ordered this TeesRoom Women's American Horror Story Hoodie for my daughter who LOVES American Horror Story. I kind of knew from past experiences with Asian sizing that it runs small so I ordered a size bigger then I normally would have for her ( which according to their sizing chart and how it compares to US sizing should have been perfect, so there comparison to US sizing in their size chart is off ) and it was still too small. I should have ordered one more size up. The sweatshirt is 100% cotton and more of a light weight material. You should wash it inside out and lay it out or hang it to dry, which I already do with all my printed shirts as it helps to preserve the printing. I did notice the print on the front was not printed on quite straight and dropped a little lower on one side. However, in all fairness, I should add that I used to work in a printing manufacturing plant where I did quality assurance looking for this type of problem before they were shipped out so I am sure it is a lot more noticeable to me then it may be to everyone else. My advice if you purchase this sweatshirt is to be cautious of what size you are ordering and order at least TWO sizes up from what you need.

I received this product for free or at a discounted price in return for my honest and unbiased review. This in no way impacts the review I left, my review is based solely on my personal opinion and the experience I have had with this product.
summary: Order up at least TWO sizes!

reviewText: The sweatshirt is nice, with expidited shipping it came in about 3 business days. However, this is incredibly small. I ordered it for someone who is an XL. So just be aware they are very, very small. I emailed the seller for a prepaid shipping label, since their sizing chart is wrong, so we will see.

This cardigan is a brilliant solution to the evening chills. I was blown away by how soft it is and how nice the fabric feels on my skin. It doesn't feel cheap or like it will fall apart, and all seams feel sturdy as well as the zipper. I love the pattern that is a subtle heathered grey, and it doesn't pill in the wash. I haven't been putting it in the dryer, but it washes just fine in the machine with usual detergent. The zipper is a great feature that totally changes the look of the cardigan from a waterfall cardi to a zipped up almost motorcycle-like jacket. I am obsessed with the thumb holes that make it ten times more comfortable and snuggly. I received this product in exchange for my honest review, all thoughts are my own. I would recommend a size up if you are on the edge, I wear a size six and the medium fits me just fine. Overall an excellent piece to add to your wardrobe! I can't wait to wear this to the airport with a comfy pair of black jeans for hours of comfort in the air and to combat the chill in the plane!

This may be one of my new favorite sweatshirts.  The fabric is somewhere between a traditional sweatshirt material and a spandex workout blend; it's very soft and washes well (I typically damp dry items in my dryer for about 15 minutes on low, and then hang them to dry).  So far it hasn't pilled much and is holding its shape nicely. The asymmetrical zipper is very flattering and slimming.  It is lightweight and layers well.  Typically I wear a S or M in most sweatshirts, so with this one I ordered the medium, based on the fact that I'm curvy, along with other reviews that said it might be long enough for leggings with a larger fit.  I'm only about 5'3".  The M was actually pretty tight across my hips and not quite long enough to cover my behind, so I think I might have been happier ordering a L.  The only thing long about this is the sleeves - I'm glad for the thumb loops to keep them in check!  Still, this sweatshirt looks great with jeans or casual skirts, and is really comfortable.  I'd definitely order again, especially if they come out with other colors.

reviewText: I have a black suitcase set like many passengers.  The blue handles are comfortable and make my bags immediately stand out. The strap stays on my suitcase since the vertical and horizontal straps are connected.  I had a lime green strap that was only horizontal and it fell off by the time my bag arrived in baggage claim.  I have used the blue strap on many international flights.  The light blue gets a little dirty due to being on the black belts but is still very visible and sets my bag apart from others. I have only used the blue straps on my large checked bag.  I have not tried adjusting the straps for my carry on bag.  I do transfer the blue handles to my carry on bag and checked bag.  I could use two more handles.  I am happy with this purchase and will repurchase.
summary: I have a black suitcase set like many passengers

It's a lovely jacket, but the proportions are very odd.

I had to check one of the preset boxes for the fit, and I chose "Somewhat Small" but it is misleading.  The general size is fine, but there really needs to be a "fits odd" option for mis-made clothing like this.

Like many manufacturers of plus sized clothing, Ulla Popken seems to have completely forgotten about arms.

Many manufacturers will take a regular sized garment and resize it larger, but take no notice of the size of the arms. We are left with garments that fit our bodies, but are ridiculously snug against the arms.

A loose, gauzy jacket should have reasonably loose arms. This one does not. They are TIGHT.

I am a fairly proportional woman. I do not have popeye arms. The sleeves in this jacket are very, very snug. If you look at the picture, snug arms do not really fit the look of this garment. I am perpetually baffled by this choice in garment designers. Is fabric so very expensive that saving a few millimeters on arm sizes makes a profit difference? Or do they just assume that larger women just swell up in the middle like balloons and maintain slender limbs?

The arms are also significantly shorter than they appear in the picture, hitting barely below the elbow, with the snug lace making bending difficult. I am tall, though, so perhaps on a very short woman they would be the right length (as long as her arms are much slenderer than the rest of her body).

Or maybe on a tyrannosaurus. The arms are perfect for a tyrannosaurus. If you are carnivorous, green, large, and have teeny little arms, I strongly suggest you grab this right away. It was made for you!
summary: Great jacket with teeny tiny little arms.
