I saw this watch and thought it would be perfect for a gift for my Paris loving friend.  Was excited when I got it in the mail today.  The package was not shipped from Amazon but from MOOG in France.  It took about a week to get.

The watch exceeded my expectations.  The band is iridescent, the main color is black with shimmery hues of green and a purple.
The rose colored metal is a few shades darker than the photo bordering on a brassy rose gold finish.  The Rose Gold Colored skyline with sparkly crystals on a background that looks like mother of pearl is beautiful.

It has a large face,  it's about 2 inches wide and 1.5 inches long.  It's very easy to read because of it's larger face.  The band appears to be leather and is approximately 9.5 inches in length.  Even though the watch is on the larger side it's not too heavy.  It's a perfect watch to go from Day to Evening.

It comes in a nice sturdy white box with red accents. The watch is packaged with a white velveteen pillow.  It makes a nice presentation for a gift.  I'm thoroughly pleased with this purchase and I know my friend will love her gift.

reviewText: I have to say, I was a bit skeptical of the seller I bought this from. The dimensions were wrong on the listing, there were no reviews, and it seemed like a bit of a red flag, but all the pictures were the bag I had been pining for and couldn't find anywhere else. I was worried I might get the wrong item, or that it would be a knock-off. Well I just received it and I have to say it seems legit. It came in a Kate Spade purse protector bag and it had all the tags inside. There are a couple of little imperfections on the leather, a weird orange-ish dot, and some wear, but it was less than list price and I can deal with it. The actual dimensions are more like 8"x6" which is what I wanted. Big enough for my iPhone 6, keys, and a small wallet. Perfect gold bag for summer!

I ordered the Yeezy 350 moonrocks from JMsneakers through Amazon. They showed up on time and 100% authentic. Be careful who you order from because there are a lot of fakes out there, the seller JMsneakers was legit though. I don't always agree with Kanye West but these shoes are probably the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. My feet, knees, back and shoulders all feel better while wearing these shoes. They even feel better in the hours after wearing them. I broke one of my toes years ago and it has caused pain in that foot, these shoes really help alleviate the pain that would run up the top of my foot. Another thing, the shoes have a wide sole that gives you good balance and the padding under your feet the "boost technology", is like standing on the most comfortable marshmallow pad you could imagine, sorry best way I could describe it. Also be sure to order your correct size, I think many people are wearing these too small. I would recommend going up a half size from your typical Nike size, if you wear a 10 in most Nikes get a 10.5 in Yeezy 350s. If they're too tight I don't think you get the full orthopedic benefits of the shoe. I don't know if it's just the Yeezy Boost 350 or all Adidas "Boost" shoes, but after owning two pairs of Yeezys I will definately be trying other adidas boost shoes in the future.
My husband loves them! He drives a lot and is very pleased with the clarity they provide.

reviewText:
Great small chain. The length I measured was 8 and 3/4 inch with about 1 and 1/2 inches to work with to extend the chain. I would consider this to be a short necklace that is small but not small enough to be a choker. If you wanted a necklace to put your necklace pedant near your cleavage you will need about 18" inch chain.

I wore the necklace for 2 weeks and didn't experience any problems or allergic reactions. The silver did not fade and the twist kept their shape. The silver goes very well with my white gold pendant.

Chain links are small, beautiful but not durable. I tugged on the chain to see how strong it was and it easily broke. I wouldn't think this length would be a problem from breaking from tugging but that's how all my other necklaces break. For the price of the chain I think it's worth it hands down.

summary: Very nice necklace, sadly not durable

reviewText: You really can't complain much for the price.  Sure, the colors are less vibrant than pictured and the glass is a bit on the cloudy side.  These are also easily 1/3 of the price of others.  As for breakability, I have had no issue.  I purchased these in 6g, and dropped them on the floor repeatedly without issue.  I have lost a few, but found these to be pretty useful for stretching purposes.  Nice to get a bit of a variety to tide you over on your way to larger sizes without making a big investment in jewelry you will wear at most a few months.  And hey, for the price it's not a bad way to pad out your jewelry box with a bit of variety.  I was going to rate them a bit lower because of the color and cloudiness, but really.  This is pretty much 3 pairs for about the price of one, and I new good and well when I bought them to not expect Gorilla Glass quality.  For what they are, they are decent.
summary: These are also easily 1/3 of the price of others

reviewText:
Update: March, 2018-Still going. Not one pair has broken and I sleep in these. Would not hesitate to purchase more colors.

I was also hesitant to purchase these based on a prior review; however, I decided to give them a try.

I am at a 6g and the glass has held up well. I have heard that glass jewelry will likely break over time regardless of size, so I don't think these will last in the long run. That said, I do sleep with them in and rotate them with other pairs just to extend the life-hopefully.

The purple and blue are not as brilliant as the picture, but the red is a beautiful fire. They are smooth, no sharp edges and very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time, minus removal for cleanings.

Overall, for the price, they are hard to beat.

The colors are nice. The blue and purple are a little more subtle that the ones pictured but they are all clearly red/blue/purple and made of glass. I love how light kind of shines through them. These particular colors are hard to find in natural stone and glass is a great alternative as I never get any irritation like I sometimes do with wood and always do with acrylic.

I highly recommend these!
summary: Owned for a few months now... LOVE these!

reviewText: One of these plugs broke during daily wear. I work in an office setting and wear a 12G glass plug in my second ear piercing and was wearing these in my first lobe piercing. During the day without cause, one of the plugs broke and shattered leaving a very sharp end in my earlobe. Do not buy these plugs. Not only are they subpar quality (they are not shiny, which indicates a low quality glass that hasn't been polished and shouldn't be worn in freshly healing lobes), they are dangerous.

reviewText: I have been really needing a good belt for a long time, but have held back for quite a while from buying one. Because I knew I would always be disappointed with something new from off the commercial shelf because of my being "husky" -size 44. Through the years, I always had to spend additional money to go out and make a hard search and buy a "punch" to make holes in the leather etc, and even then, that wasn't a good option because the leather would be not of quality, not hold up well, get heavy and look awful after a time and make you feel shabby. And poor. Speaking as an American, this should not be that way! So that being said, I am proud to announce the "Grip 6" which is a remarkable piece of "American ingenuity". And I am promoting it 100%! It's minimalistic space age front plate "buckel" and belt is just what a middle aged person like myself, who is getting a slight paunch could need! Without all the worry, of being poked in the underside of a tummy! I am planning to purchase a few more off Amazon, with different plate colors as well as belt colors. If you are looking for a belt this is it. I just wish that Grip 6 wold make larger sizes (beyond my 44) because I know there are plenty of working class "Bubba's" who would be proud as hell to wear these belts! With that said, buy one now! I will!
summary: Attention all Bubba's and Rednecks, the perfect belt is here!
